S06psp_6-8u:145_1: bhāvayitavyā. iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenābhāvasvabhāvayogena tyāgo 'nusmartavyo

S06psp_6-8u:146_0: cittam evaṃ notpadyate dadāmi vā na dadāmi vā parityajāmi vā na parityajāmi vāṅgapratyaṅgāni

S06psp_6-8u:147: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yeṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti te 'bhāvāḥ. evaṃ manasikurvāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:148: asmṛtir amanasikārā tyāgānusmṛtiḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tyāgānusmṛtir manasikartavyā yatra svabhāvasaṃjñāpi nāsti,

S06psp_6-8u:152_2: deveṣūpapannās traystriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tusiteṣu nirmānaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu
S06psp_6-8u:152_3: deveṣūpapannās te 'bhāvasvabhāvato manasikartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06psp_6-8u:157: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaḍanusmṛtīr manasikurvato 'nupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣānupūrvapratipat prajñāyate.
S06psp_6-8u:159_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratānupūrvakriyāṃ

S06psp_6-8u:166: sa evaṃ bodhimārge śikṣamāṇo 'bhāvasvabhāvān sarvadharmān abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:167: yatrāṇv api smṛtikarma nāsti kutaḥ punā rūpaṃ vā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ vā, evaṃ (PSP_6-8:11)
S06psp_6-8u:168: skandhadhatvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā pāramitā vā śūnyatā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:169_1: vā sarvākārajñatā vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_6-8u:169_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā anupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣā prajñāyate 'nupūrvapratipat prajñāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:170: yatra kriyāyaṃ cittaṃ caryā pratipac chikṣā ca pravartate.
S06psp_6-8u:171: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:172: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tan nāsti rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:173_0: nāsti vijñānaṃ nāsti skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā nāsti pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni
S06psp_6-8u:173_4: buddho nāsti dharmo nāsti saṃgho nāsti mārgo nāsti phalaṃ nāsti saṃkleśo nāsti vyavadānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:173_5: nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayo yāvan nāsti sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:174: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:175: api nu subhūte 'bhāvasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣv astitā vā nāstitā vopalabhate.
S06psp_6-8u:177: no bhagavann abhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣv astitā vā nāstitā vopalabhate.
S06psp_6-8u:179: tat katham idaṃ subhūte evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:180: yady abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tan nāsti rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā,
S06psp_6-8u:184: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:185: nāhaṃ bhagavann atra dharmeṣu kāṅkṣāmi na vicikitsāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:186: api tu khalu bhagavan bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani bhikṣavaḥ śrāvakayānikāś ca pratyekabuddhayānikāś ca bodhisattvayānikāś ca ta evaṃ vakṣyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:187: abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ ko 'tra saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ te jānantaḥ śīlavipannāś ca bhaviṣyanti dṛṣṭivipannāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:188: ācāravipannāś ca teṣāṃ śīlavipannānāṃ dṛṣṭivipannānām ācāravipannānāṃ trayāṇām gatīnām anyatarā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06psp_6-8u:189: narakagatir vā tiryagyonigatir vā yamalokagatir vā,
S06psp_6-8u:190_0: idam apy ahaṃ bhagavann anāgataṃ bhayaṃ saṃpaśyamānas tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham
S06psp_6-8u:190_1: etad arthaṃ prcchāmi. api tu khalu punar bhagavann aham eteṣu dharmeṣu na kāṅkṣāmi na vicikitsāmi.
S06psp_6-8u:192: sādhu sādhu subhūte evam etad yathā vadasy evam etat.
S06psp_6-8u:193: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:194: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamānā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānām arthāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:196: yata eva subhūte 'bhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tata eva bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:197: tathā hi duḥkhākṣayaś ca subhūte upalaṃbho nopalaṃbhasaṃjñinaḥ prāptir nābhisamayo nānuttarā ca samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:199: kiṃ punar bhagavann anupalaṃbhasya prāptir vābhisamayo vānuttarā vā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:201: anupalaṃbha eva subhūte prāptir anupalaṃbha evābhisamayaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:203: dharmadhātor avikopitatām upādāya dharmadhātuṃ sa icched vikopayituṃ yo 'nupalaṃbhaprāptiṃ (PSP_6-8:13)
S06psp_6-8u:206: yadi bhagavann anupalaṃbhasya na prāptir nābhisamayo nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:207: anupalaṃbha eva prāptir anupalaṃbha evābhisamayo 'nupalaṃbha evānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:208: tat kutaḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamā bhūmiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:209: kuto dvitīyā kutas tṛtīyā yāvat kuto daśamī bhūmiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:217: kuto vipākajā prajñā yatra vipāke sthitvā vipākajair dharmaiḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_6-8u:220_0: annena ca pānena ca yānaiś ca vastravastugandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākābhiḥ
S06psp_6-8u:220_1: śayanāsanopāśrayeṇa pradīpenānyatarānyatarābhir vā mānuṣyakībhiḥ saṃpattibhis tāś
S06psp_6-8u:220_2: cāsya nocchedyante yāvat parinirvṛtasya śarīre śrāvakeṣu ca vipacyate tac ca na kṣīyate.
S06psp_6-8u:221: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:222_0: yata eva subhūte 'nupalaṃbhas tata eva prathamā bhūmir dvitīyā bhūmis tṛtīyā bhūmir
S06psp_6-8u:222_1: yāvad daśamī bhūmis tasyaiva vipākajāḥ pañcābhijñās tataś caivaiṃ vipākajaṃ dānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:222_2: śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā ca tataś caiva kuśalamūlāni vipākajāni yaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ
S06psp_6-8u:222_3: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti buddhakṣetrañ ca parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:223_1: prādīpenānyatarānyatarābhir vā mānuṣyopakaraṇasaṃpattibhis tāś cāsya nopacchidyante,
S06psp_6-8u:224: yāvat parinirvṛtasya caiva pūjāḥ pravartante śarīre śrāvakeṣu ca vipacyante.
S06psp_6-8u:225: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:226: anupalaṃbhasya ca bhagavan dānasya ca śīlasya ca kṣānteś ca vīryasya ca dhyānasya ca prajñāyāś cābhijñānāṃ ca ko viśeṣaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:229: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:230_0: anupalaṃbhasya ca subhūte dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñābhijñānāṃ ca na kiñcin nānākaraṇaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:230_1: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte 'nupaliptaṃ dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñābhijñā
S06psp_6-8u:232: kathaṃ punar bhagavann anupaliptānāṃ dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñānām abhijñānāñ ca na kiñcin nānākaraṇaṃ nirdiśyate?
S06psp_6-8u:234: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupalabhya dānam anupalabhya pratigrāhakaṃ dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:249_0: anupalabhya buddhadharmān bodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:249_1: mahāsattvo 'nupalaṃbhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:253: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyām anupūrvābhisamayādhikāro
S06psp_6-8u:257: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:258: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ekacittena ṣaṭprajñāḥ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:259_0: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
S06psp_6-8u:259_1: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny
S06psp_6-8u:259_2: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgān trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ
S06psp_6-8u:259_3: pañcābhijñā adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ daśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_6-8u:259_4: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān aśītyanuvyañjanāni
S06psp_6-8u:262: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yad dānaṃ dadāti tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:274: yān daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikān buddhadharmān yāṃ mahākaruṇāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:277: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:278: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattva ekacittena ṣaṭpāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_6-8u:282: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīto yad dānaṃ dadāti tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:287: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:295: kathaṃ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:296: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:303: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:304: sa tatra dānapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭpāramitā antargatāḥ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:305_0: yāvat sarvabodhipakṣyān dharmān antargatāṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte
S06psp_6-8u:305_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti sa tatrānāsrave
S06psp_6-8u:305_2: citte sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti sa tatrānāsrave citte sthito nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati. kasmai vā dadāmi?
S06psp_6-8u:314: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittopagatena cittena śīlaṃ rakṣati,
S06psp_6-8u:318: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittopagatena cittena kṣāntyā saṃpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:322: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittopagatena cittena vīryam ārabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:326: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:330: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:331: sa tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayan na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:334_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena
S06psp_6-8u:338: sa tān dharmān na samanupaśyati, tac (PSP_6-8:18)
S06psp_6-8u:342: kathaṃ bhagavann animittān abhisaṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dānapāramitāparipūritā bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:344: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya paripūrir bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:347: pañcānām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:348: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:349: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:350_1: yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyopakaraṇapariṣkārān ādhyātmikāṃ bāhyāṃ vā bhāryāputraduhitṛrājyaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:350_2: vālaṃkṛtya dānaṃ dadāti yācanakānān tasya kaścid evāgatyaivaṃ vadet:
S06psp_6-8u:351: kin te 'nena īdṛśena dānena dattenaivaṃ nirūpakāreṇa tasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:353: kin te 'nena vā dānena vā dattenaivam āsphārikena dattenārthasya ca dātavyam evaṃ mayā dānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:354: na ca mayā na dātavyam. sa dānaṃ sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:355: sa tathā pariṇāmayati yathā pariṇāmayan nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:359: kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati kva vā parināmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:363: adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:364: sa evaṃ paśyati ko vā pariṇāmayiṣyati kutra vā pariṇāmayiṣyati kiṃ vā pariṇāmayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:365: tasyaivaṃ pariṇāmayataḥ pariṇāmo bhavati nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ sarvasattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_6-8u:377: yathā caiva vipākañ ca na parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:378: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ manasaiva sarvopakaraṇāni bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:379: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya manasaiva sarvopakaraṇaṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:380: sa tena dānena buddhāṃś ca bhagavata upatiṣṭhati,
S06psp_6-8u:381_0: sadevamānuṣāsurañ ca lokaṃ saṃtarpayati sa tān sattvāṃs tayā dānapāramitayā parigṛhyopāyakauśalyena
S06psp_6-8u:381_1: triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:383: kathaṃ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:385: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tac chīlam āryam anāsravaṃ mārgaparyāpannaṃ dharmatāprātilaṃbhikaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:387: sa cāsya śīlaskandho 'khaṇḍo bhavaty acchidro 'śavalo 'kalmāṣo 'parāmṛṣṭo 'bhujiṣyaḥ susamātto vijñapraśastaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:388: tena ca śīlena kaṃcid dharmaṃ na parāmṛśati,
S06psp_6-8u:389: rūpaṃ vā vedanāṃ vā saṃjñāṃ vā saṃskārāṃ vā vijñānaṃ vā dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni (PSP_6-8:20)
S06psp_6-8u:390_0: vāśītyanuvyañjanāni vā kṣatriyamahāśālakulaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakulaṃ vā gṛhapatimahāśālakulaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:390_1: vā cāturmahārājakāyikān vā devāṃs trayastriṃśān vā yāmān vā tuṣitān vā nirmāṇaratīn
S06psp_6-8u:390_2: vā paranirmitavaśavartino vā brahmapāriṣadyān vā brahmapurohitān vā mahābrahmāṇo
S06psp_6-8u:390_3: vā parīttābhān vā apramāṇābhān vā ābhāsvarābhān vā parīttaśubhān vā apramāṇaśubhān
S06psp_6-8u:390_4: vā śubhakṛtsṇān vā anabhrakān vā puṇyaprasavān vā bṛhatphalān vā asaṃjñisattvān vā
S06psp_6-8u:390_5: śuddhāvāsān vā aspṛhān vā atapān vā sudṛśān vā sudarśanān vā akaniṣṭhān vā ākāśānantyāyatanān
S06psp_6-8u:390_6: vā vijñānānantyāyatanān vā ākiñcanyāyatanān vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanān vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:390_7: vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā cakravartirājyādhipatyaṃ vā na parāmṛśati,
S06psp_6-8u:391: anyatra sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:394: tayā ca śīlapāramitayā paripūrṇayopāyakauśalyena catvāri dhyānāny utpādayaty anāsvādayogena divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:395: yena divyacakṣuṣā vipākajena ye pūrvasyān diśi lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:396: tān paśyati tac cāsya darśanaṃ ca na naśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:398: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyān diśy uttarasyān diśy ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:399: tān paśyati tasya darśanaṃ na naśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:400: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. sa divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:401: tac cāsya śrutaṃ tāvan na naśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:402: yāvan na tena śrutenātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:403: sa cetaḥparyāyajñānena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajānāti tena cetaḥparyāyajñānena sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti, sa (PSP_6-8:21)
S06psp_6-8u:404: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānenātītaṃ karma nirdiśati yena karmaṇākṛtena tat karma na vipraṇasyati,
S06psp_6-8u:412_0: evaṃ yatra yatra pratibalāḥ sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tatra tatra pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_6-8u:412_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena
S06psp_6-8u:414: katham animittānām anābhogānām anupalaṃbhamānānām apratibhānām anabhisaṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:416_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍe
S06psp_6-8u:416_1: niṣaṇṇasya sarvasattvā āgatya loṣṭadaṇḍaprahārān dahyus tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaikacittasyāpi
S06psp_6-8u:416_2: kṣobhasahagatasyāvakāśo na dātavyas tatra ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dve kṣāntī
S06psp_6-8u:416_3: bhāvayitavye. katame dve yac ca sarvasattvānāṃ kṣāntavyam ākrośadaṇḍaloṣṭaprahārādiyā
S06psp_6-8u:416_4: cāsyānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir utpādayitavyā tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenākruśyamānena
S06psp_6-8u:416_5: paribhāṣyamāṇena loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān dadatām evaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ ko me ākrośati
S06psp_6-8u:416_6: vā paribhāṣate vā loṣṭadaṇḍaśastrair vā prahārān dadāti tena dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:416_7: pratyavekṣitavyo dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmāṃś caiva nopalabhate kutaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:416_8: punar dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvam. tasyaivaṃ dharmasvabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:417: ko me cchinatti vā bhinatti vā sa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmāṇāṃ dharmasvabhāvam anutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:418: tatrānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ kim iti kleśānutpattijñānānācchedyatā ca sa iha dvābhyāṃ kṣāntibhyāṃ yuktaś catvāri dhyānāni paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:419: catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni caturarddhipādāni pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni (PSP_6-8:22)
S06psp_6-8u:420: āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:421_0: sa iha dharmeṣu sthitvāryeṣv anāsraveṣu lokottareṣu sādhāraṇeṣu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair
S06psp_6-8u:421_1: abhijñāḥ paripūrayati yābhir abhijñābhiḥ paripūritābhiḥ ṣaḍbhiś ca pāramitābhiḥ samudāgacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:422: sa ihābhijñāsu sthitvā divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi yān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati tān dṛṣṭvā buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:423: tasya sā buddhānusmṛtir nocchetsyati yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:424: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu yān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati tān dṛṣṭvā buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:427_0: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa yat te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣiṣyante
S06psp_6-8u:427_1: tat sarvam udgrahīṣyaty udgṛhṇaṃ tathatvāya sattvānāṃ dharman deśayiṣyati teṣāṃ ca
S06psp_6-8u:427_2: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāsyaty evaṃ sarvāryāṇāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:427_3: yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:428: sa tena cetaḥ paryāyajñānena sattvānāṃ cetasaiva caittam ājñāya tathatvāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:429: sa pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlam ājñāya tena pūrveṇa kuśalamūlena sattvān saṃdarśayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati samādāpayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:430: sa āsravakṣayajñānena ca tān sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu niveśayiṣyati pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:431_0: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvāṃś
S06psp_6-8u:431_1: ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:431_2: paripūrayaty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati.
S06psp_6-8u:431_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:434: carann ānimitteṣv anāsraveṣv anābhogeṣv anupalaṃbheṣv apratibhāseṣu vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:436: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgataḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:437: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:439: yāvac candrasūryau pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārṣṭi sa tena kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato yena daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto viharanti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:440_0: anekaśatasahasreṣu lokadhātuṣv ṛddhyā gatvā tān buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhati cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārais
S06psp_6-8u:440_1: tasya te cīvarapiṇḍapātrās tāvan na kṣīyante yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate
S06psp_6-8u:441: cīvarapiṇḍapātreṇa parinirvṛtasya ca śarīre pūjā pravartate,
S06psp_6-8u:442: tenaiva carddhyabhisaṃskāreṇa gatvā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:445: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:446_0: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāṃ paripūrayaty anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_6-8u:446_1: abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:446_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:446_3: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgata āryeṇānāsraveṇa
S06psp_6-8u:446_4: mārgāṅgena mārgaparyāpannena vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayatīha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:446_5: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃś caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato 'kuśalasya kāyikakarmaṇo
S06psp_6-8u:446_6: 'vakāśaṃ na dadāty akuśalasya vākkarmaṇo 'kuśalasya manaskarmaṇo 'vakāśaṃ na dadāti
S06psp_6-8u:446_7: na parāmṛśati nityam iti vā anityam iti vā sukham iti vā duḥkham iti vātmeti vānātmeti
S06psp_6-8u:446_8: vā saṃskṛtam iti vāsaṃskṛtam iti vā kāmadhātum iti vā rūpadhātum iti vārūpyadhātuṃ
S06psp_6-8u:447: prathamaṃ vā dhyānaṃ dvitīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ caturthaṃ vā dhyānaṃ maitrīṃ vā karuṇāṃ vā muditāṃ vopekṣāṃ vākāśānantyāyatanaṃ (PSP_6-8:24)
S06psp_6-8u:448: va vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ vākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:449: smṛtyupasthānāni vā samyakprahāṇāni varddhipādāṃ vā indriyāṇi vā balāni vā bodhyaṅgāni vāryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ vā mārgaṃ śūnyatāṃ vānimittaṃ vāpraṇihitaṃ vāryasatyāni vābhijñā vā vimokṣān
S06psp_6-8u:450_0: vā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr vā samādhīn vā dhāraṇīmukhāni vā tathāgatabalāni vā
S06psp_6-8u:450_1: vaiśāradyāni vā pratisaṃvido vāveṇikān vā buddhadharmān na parāmṛśati nityānityasukhaduḥkhātmānātmaśāntāśānta iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:451_0: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekāṃ vā bodhim
S06psp_6-8u:451_1: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ srotaāpannaṃ vā sakṛdāgāminaṃ vānāgāminaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā
S06psp_6-8u:451_2: pratyekabuddhaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ vā buddhaṃ vā bhagavantaṃ na parāmṛśatīme sattvā
S06psp_6-8u:453: ime ūrddhabhāgikaprabhāvitā ime sarvajñatāprabhāvitā ime mārgajñatāprabhāvitā ime sarvākārajñatāprabhāvitā ity evam api na parāmṛśati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:454: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:456: sa tena caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato maraṇasukhe 'pi vartamānaḥ sattvānām arthaṃ karoti tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:462: sa tena kāyikena caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgatas tān kuśalān dharmān parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:465: lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmati sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:466: sattvānām arthaṃ kurvan yena yenarddhiprātihāryeṇecchati vikurvituṃ tena tenarddhiprātihāryeṇa vikurvati,
S06psp_6-8u:467_0: yadi vā puṣpavarṣeṇa yadi vā gandhapramuñcanena yadi vā gītābharaṇena yadi vā bhūcalanena
S06psp_6-8u:467_1: yadi vā saptaratnamayair lokadhātusaṃdarśanena yadi vā jyotiratnānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśa
S06psp_6-8u:467_2: ātmānam avasṛjati yadi vā gandham avasṛjati yadi vā mahāyajñam avasṛjati,
S06psp_6-8u:471: adattādānāt kāmamithyācārān mṛṣāvādāt piśunavacanāt paruṣavacanād avaddhapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādāt mithyādṛṣṭeḥ parimocayati,
S06psp_6-8u:476: evaṃ yena yenopāyena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:478: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:480: kathañ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:482: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sthāpayitvā tathāgatasamādhiṃ sarvasamādhīn paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:483_0: sa viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sa vitarkaṃ sa vicāraṃ vivekajaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:483_1: prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:484: maitrīsahagatena cittena karuṇāsahagatena muditāsahagatenopekṣāsahagatena cittena yāvat sarvāvantam lokadhātum upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:485: ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:486: sa tatra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvāṣṭavimokṣān anulomapratilomān upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:492: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vajropamaṃ ca samādhim upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:496_0: kṛtvā śuklavidarśanā bhūmim atikramya gotrabhūmim aṣṭamakabhūmiṃ tanubhūmiṃ darśanabhūmiṃ
S06psp_6-8u:496_1: vītarāgabhūmiṃ kṛtāvibhūmiṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:501: so 'tra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:502: buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsamānaḥ sa tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike kuśalamūlam avaropayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:506: sattvān dānena saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścic chīlena saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścit kṣāntyā saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścid vīryeṇa saṃgṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:509: kāṃścid vimuktyā kāṃścid vimuktijñānadarśanena kāṃścit srotāapattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:510: kāṃścit sakṛdāgāmiphale kāṃścid anāgāmiphale kāṃścid arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:511: kāṃścit pratyekabodhau kāṃścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:512: yair yaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ sattvā udgacchanti tatra tān sattvān niyojayati sa iha dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasamādhimukhāny abhinirharati catasraś ca pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:513: pratilabhate vipākajānāñ cābhijñānām lābhī bhavati sa na jātu mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:514: na jātu kāmān pratisevate na sā kācid upapattir yāṃ na gṛhṇāti na cotpattir doṣair lipyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:515: tathā hi tena māyopamā sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ supratibuddhā bhavanti sa māyopamaṃ sarvasaṃskāragataṃ viditvā mahākaruṇā pratigṛhītaḥ sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:516: na ca tatra sattvān sattvaprajñaptim upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:517_0: sa sattvān sattvaprajñaptim anupalaṃbhamānaḥ sarvadharmāṇām anupalaṃbha eva sattvān
S06psp_6-8u:517_1: pratiṣṭhāpayati lokavyavahāram upādāya na ca punaḥ paramārthena iha dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:517_2: sthitvā sarvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiṣu carati na jātu dhyānapāramitayā virahito bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:519: sa iha sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatām abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:522_0: sa ātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ kurvan sadevamānuṣāsuralokasya dakṣiṇīyo bhavāti. evaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:522_1: khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:523: iti dānādīnām anyatamena sarvānāsravaikalakṣaṇasaṃgrahalakṣaṇo 'yam ekacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ prathamaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:525: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāpripūrim gacchati?
S06psp_6-8u:527: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcid dharmaṃ sadbhūtaṃ vā pariniṣpannaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:529: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāsadbhūtatām apariniṣpannatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:531: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:532: sa rūpasyotpādam asamanupaśyan vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ na samanupaśyan rūpasyāyadvāraṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:534: evaṃ yāvat sarvasāsravānāṃ dharmāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āyadvāraṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:536: evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpasya svabhāvan nopalabhate yāvat sarvasāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvan nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:537: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvān sarvadharmān adhimucate,
S06psp_6-8u:538: sa evam adhimucyādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran na keṣu kācid dharmeṣv abhiniviśate,
S06psp_6-8u:539_0: rūpe vā vedanāyāṃ vā saṃjñāyāṃ vā saṃskāreṣu vā vijñāne vā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:539_1: vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu vā pāramitāsu vā śūnyatāsu vā bodhipakṣyeṣu vā dharmeṣv
S06psp_6-8u:542_0: yad uta ṣaṭpāramitā yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmān
S06psp_6-8u:542_1: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny aśītyanuvyañjanāni paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:543_0: sa vipākajadharme bodhisattvamārge sthitvā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu paripūrṇāsu yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:543_1: dharmeṣu paripūrṇesu yāvad vipākajāsu pañcasv abhijñāsu sthitvā ye sattvā dānenānugrahītavyās
S06psp_6-8u:544: ye śīlena ye samādhinā ye prajñayā ye vimuktyā ye vimuktijñānadarśanenānugrahītavyās tāṃs tair anugṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:545_0: ye srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā ye sakṛdāgāmiphale ye 'nāgāmiphale ye 'rhattve
S06psp_6-8u:545_1: ye pratyekabodhau ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās tān anuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:546: evaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ so 'nekavidhām ṛddhiṃ kurvāṇo gaṅgānadīvālukopamām lokadhātūn na gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:547: sa ākāṅkṣaṃs tāṃ lokadhātūn yādṛśai ratnair
S06psp_6-8u:548: ākāṃkṣati tādṛśai ratnair abhinirmiṇoti sa sattvābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayaṃ lokadhātūn saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:549: sa tāṃ lokadhātūn dṛṣṭvā buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:551: ye 'py anye lokadhātavo 'pagatapāpiṣṭhā evaṃ vidhās tenopabhogaparibhogāḥ syur iti,
S06psp_6-8u:552_0: sa tayā vipākajayā dānapāramitayā śīlapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā vīryapāramitayā
S06psp_6-8u:552_1: dhyānapāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā vipākajābhir abhijñābhir vipākajena bodhisattvamārgeṇa
S06psp_6-8u:552_2: mārgajñatāyāṃ caran sarvapāramitāḥ prāptaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:553: yāvat sarvañ caiva rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apagṛhītaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:554: yāvat sarvadharmāḥ kuśalā vākuśalā vā laukikā vā lokottarā vā sāsravā vānāsravā vā saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā sāvadyā vānavadyā vā (PSP_6-8:29)
S06psp_6-8u:556: tasmāt tarhi subhūte tasyānuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre 'parigṛhītaḥ sarvopabhogo bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:557: tathā hi sarvadharmā aparigṛhltā anupalaṃbhayogena. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimittayogena prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:559: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:560: kathaṃ bhagavann evam asaṃbhinneṣu dharmeṣv ānimitteṣu lakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu ṣaṭpāramitābhāvanāparipūrir bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:561: dānapāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ katham eṣāṃ sāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñaptaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:564: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyām antargatā bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:565: kathaṃ bhagavann evam alakṣaṇeṣu dharmeṣv ekalakṣaṇeṣu yad utālakṣaṇeṣu nānākaraṇaṃ prabhāvyate.
S06psp_6-8u:566: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:567_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu
S06psp_6-8u:567_1: pratiśrutkopameṣu pratibhāsopameṣu pratibiṃbhopameṣu marīcyupameṣu māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:567_2: gandharvanagaropameṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:567_3: rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānāni samāpadyate prajñāṃ bhāvayati
S06psp_6-8u:567_4: svapnopamāṃś ca pañcaskandhān alakṣaṇān jānāti pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān
S06psp_6-8u:567_5: marīcyupamān māyopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca pañcaskandhān alakṣaṇān
S06psp_6-8u:568: na hi svapnaṃ tasya kaścit svabhāvo na hi pratiśrutkāyā na hi pratibhāsasya na hi pratibiṃbasya na hi marīcyā na hi māyāyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:569: na hi nirmitakasya na hi gandharvanagarasya kaścit svabhāvo (PSP_6-8:30)
S06psp_6-8u:570: yasya svabhāvo nāsti tasya nāsti lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:571: yasya ca nāsti lakṣaṇaṃ sa ekalakṣaṇo yad utālakṣaṇaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:572: tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam alakṣaṇaṃ dānam alakṣaṇo dāyako 'lakṣaṇaḥ pratigrāhako 'lakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. evaṃ jñātvā dānaṃ dadāti sa dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:573: sa dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayan śīlapāramitāyāṃ na vivartate,
S06psp_6-8u:578: sa āsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā catvāri dhyānāni paripūrayati catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:588_0: iha vipākajeṣv āryeṣv anāsraveṣu sthitvā daśasu dikṣu ye lokadhātavas tān ṛddhyā
S06psp_6-8u:588_1: gatvā buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāste tāṃś copatiṣṭhati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyasarvopakaraṇapariṣkārair
S06psp_6-8u:589_0: ye dānena saṃgrahītavyās tān dānena saṃgṛhṇāti ye śīleṇa saṃgrahītavyā ye kṣāntyā
S06psp_6-8u:589_1: saṃgrahītavyā ye vīryeṇa saṃgrahītavyā ye dhyānena saṃgrahītavyā ye prajñayā saṃgrahītavyās
S06psp_6-8u:590_0: yāvad ye sarvaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃgrahītavyās tān sarvān kuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti
S06psp_6-8u:590_1: kuśalair dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ saṃsāraṃ copādadāti na ca saṃsārāvacarair duṣkhair
S06psp_6-8u:590_2: lipyate sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo devamānuṣikīñ ca saṃpattim utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:592: so 'lakṣaṇān sarvasattvāṃ jñātvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_6-8u:593: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra (PSP_6-8:31)
S06psp_6-8u:594: tiṣṭhati, anāgāmiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_6-8u:595: arhattvañ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_6-8u:596: pratyekabodhiṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:597_0: tathā hi tena sarvākārajñatānuprāptavyā yo 'sādhāraṇā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:597_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇān sarvadharmān jñātvā ṣaṭpāramitā alakṣaṇā jānāti,
S06psp_6-8u:599_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ svapnopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:599_2: māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:600_0: sa khalu punaḥ svapnopamān pañcopādānaskandhān jñātvā pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān
S06psp_6-8u:600_1: pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca pañcopādānaskandhān
S06psp_6-8u:601_0: akhaṇḍām acchidrām aśabalām akalmāṣām aparāmṛṣṭām abhujiṣyāṃ vijñapraśastāṃ susamāttām
S06psp_6-8u:601_1: āryām anāsravāṃ mārgāṅgaparyāpannāṃ yatra sthitvā samatābhisaṃskārikaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣati
S06psp_6-8u:601_2: dharmatāpratilaṃbhikaṃ ca vijñaptiśīlaṃ ca samudācāraśīlaṃ ca so 'nenaivaṃrūpeṇa
S06psp_6-8u:602_1: vā sahavratāyopapadyeyāhaṃ rājā vā bhaveyaṃ cakravartī koṭṭarājā vā cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:602_2: vā devānāṃ sahavratāyopapadyeyāhaṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ vā yāmānāṃ vā tuṣitānāṃ vā nirmānaratīnāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:602_3: vā paranirmitavaśavartināṃ vā devānāṃ sahavratāyopapadyeyāhaṃ brahmapārṣadyānāṃ vā
S06psp_6-8u:602_4: brahmaprohitānāṃ vā mahābrahmāṇāṃ vā parīttābhānāṃ vāpramāṇābhānāṃ vābhāsvarāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:602_5: vā parīttaśubhānāṃ vāpramāṇaśubhānāṃ vā śubhakṛtsnānāṃ vānabhrakānāṃ vā puṇyaprasavānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:602_6: vā bṛhatphalānāṃ vāsaṃjñisattvānāṃ vā śuddhāvāsānāṃ vā (PSP_6-8:32)
S06psp_6-8u:603_0: aspṛhāṇāṃ vā aptapānāṃ vā sudṛśānāṃ vā sudarśanānāṃ vā akaniṣṭhānāṃ vā devānāṃ sahavratāyopapadyeyāham
S06psp_6-8u:603_1: ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ vā vijñānānantyāyatanānāṃ vākiñcanyāyatanānāṃ vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:603_2: vā sahavratyāyopapadyeyāhaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vānuprāpnuyāṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:603_3: vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vānuprāpnuyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:604: tathā hi subhūte 'lakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā ekalakṣaṇāṃ yad utābhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:605: na hy alakṣaṇo dharmo 'lakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:606: nāpi vilakṣaṇo dharmo vilakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:607: nāpy avilakṣaṇo dharmo 'vilakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ prāpayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann alakṣaṇāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:608_0: śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrānto
S06psp_6-8u:608_1: 'nutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate 'nutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhya
S06psp_6-8u:609: pañcasu dhāraṇīmukhaśateṣu sthitvā catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:610: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṇa budhhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāste sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:611: sa pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃsarati na ca saṃsārāvacareṇa karmaṇā vipākajena lipyate,
S06psp_6-8u:612: tadyathāpi nāma nirmitaś caṃkramati ca tiṣṭhati ca niṣīdati ca śayyāṃ ca parikalpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:614: na gamanaṃ na sthānaṃ na niṣadyāṃ na śayyāṃ nāsanaṃ na caṃkramaḥ sa sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:615: na ca sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptiṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:616: tadyathāpi nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati,
S06psp_6-8u:617: aparimāṇān sattvān vinīya tribhir yānair na kaścit sattvam upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:618_0: yam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākuryāt sa āyuḥ saṃskārān avasṛjya nirmitam abhinirmāyānupadhiśeṣe
S06psp_6-8u:618_1: nirvāṇadhātau pariniryāyāt. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte nirmitaḥ kalpasyātyayena bodhisattvaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:618_2: mahāsattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpya parinirvṛtas tasya ca parinirvṛtasya
S06psp_6-8u:620: rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:621: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:623_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:623_2: māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:625: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:627: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś catasṛbhiḥ kṣāntibhiḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:629_0: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasyātrāntare sarvasattvā ākrośeyur vā paribhāṣeran vāsatyayā
S06psp_6-8u:629_1: vācā paruṣayā vā samudācareyur loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadyus tatra bodhisattvena
S06psp_6-8u:630: ko me ākrośati vā paribhāṣate vāsatyayā vācā paruṣayā vā samudācarati loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:633: sarvadharmāḥ kṣamanti tat kiṃ asyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:634: ko me ākrośati vā paribhāṣate vāsatyayā vācā paruṣayā vā samudācarati loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadāti sa evam upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:635: so 'nayā kṣāntipāramitayā paripūrṇayānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate.
S06psp_6-8u:636: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:637: kaiṣā bhagavann anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ kiṃ vā etasyāḥ pramāṇaṃ kiṃ vā jñānam?
S06psp_6-8u:638: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:639: aṇavo 'pi subhūte 'kuśalā dharmā notpadyante tenocyante 'nutpattikā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:640: tatra yā kṣāntis tad ucyate jñānaṃ yena jñānenānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ (PSP_6-8:34)
S06psp_6-8u:642: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:643: yā ca bhagavan śrāvakānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhānāṃ vānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir yā ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir āsāṃ kṣāntīnāṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:645: yac ca subhūte srotaāpannasya jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:646: yac ca sakṛdāgāmino jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:647: yac cānāgāmināṃ jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:648: yac cārhato jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:649: yac ca pratyekabuddhasya jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ. idaṃ subhūte nānākaraṇaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kṣānter bodhisattvakṣānteś ca,
S06psp_6-8u:650_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ihaivaṃ rūpayā kṣāntyā samanvāgataḥ
S06psp_6-8u:650_1: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhān abhibhavati vipākajāyām anutpattikāyāṃ kṣāntyāṃ sthitvā
S06psp_6-8u:651: yayā paripūrṇayāvirahito bhavati saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaiś ca samādhibhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:652: sa iha pañcabhir abhijñābhir avirahito bhavati so 'virahitatvād ābhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhiḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:653: sattvāṃś ca paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:654_0: punar aparaṃ subhūtr bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:654_2: māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:656: kathañ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:658: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyikaṃ ca caitasikaṃ ca vīryam ārabhate sa kāyikena vīryeṇa ṛddhim abhinirharati, (PSP_6-8:35)
S06psp_6-8u:659: daśadiglokadhātuṃ gatvā buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:660_0: sa tena kāyikena vīryeṇa sattvān pāripācayati triṣu yāneṣu niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati
S06psp_6-8u:660_1: śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne 'nuttare buddhayāne. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:660_2: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann alakṣaṇāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:661: sa caitasikena vīryeṇānāsraveṇa mārgaparyāpannena vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:662_0: yatra paryāpannāḥ sarvakuśalā dharmās tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni
S06psp_6-8u:662_1: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañcabalāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ trīṇi
S06psp_6-8u:662_2: vimokṣamukhāni catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭavimokṣā
S06psp_6-8u:662_3: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś catvāri satyāni pañcābhijñāḥ samādhiḥ dhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_6-8u:662_4: daśa bodhisattvabhūmayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_6-8u:663_0: yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caratā sarvākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā yasyāṃ paripūrṇāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:663_1: sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiṃ prahāsyati sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiṃ prahāya lakṣaṇapariniṣpattiṃ paripūrayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:664_0: lakṣaṇapariniṣpattiṃ paripūrya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran samantaprabhatām ārāgayiṣyati
S06psp_6-8u:664_1: samantaprabhatām ārāgya dharmacakraṃ ca pravartayiṣyati dvādaśākāran triparivartasya
S06psp_6-8u:664_2: pravartatena trisāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampiṣyate saṃprakampiṣyate pravedhiṣyate saṃpravedhiṣyate,
S06psp_6-8u:666: sarve ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsena sphāriṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:667_0: tasya punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śabdo niścariṣyati tatra ye trisāhasre
S06psp_6-8u:667_1: mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās taṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyanti te sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttareṣu triṣu yāneṣu,
S06psp_6-8u:668_0: evaṃ bahuprakārā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā yasyāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:668_1: sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāptavyāḥ. evaṃ khalu
S06psp_6-8u:670_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:671: nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu ca pañcasūpadānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:673: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:675_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
S06psp_6-8u:675_1: viharati dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati maitrīkaruṇāṃ muditām
S06psp_6-8u:675_3: upasaṃpadya viharati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhīṃ bhāvayati vidyutopamañ ca samādhiṃ
S06psp_6-8u:675_4: bhāvayati vajropamañ ca samādhiṃ bhāvayati yatra samādhau sthitvā ye kecit samādhayaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:676: śrāvakasamādhir vā pratyekabuddhasamādhir vā ye 'py anye samādhigaṇās tān sarvān kāyena saṃspṛśyopasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:678: na ca samāpattiphalam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:679: tathā hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān samādhīn alakṣaṇān jānāty abhāvasvabhāvatvāt tat kim alakṣaṇo dharmo 'lakṣaṇaṃ dharmam āsvādayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:681: so 'nāsvādayan na kasyacit samāpatter vaśenopapatsyate kāmadhātau vā rūpadhātau vārūpyadhātau vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:682: tathā hi sa tān dhātūn nopalabhate yo 'pi samāpadyeta yena vā samāpadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:683: tam api nopalabhate 'nupalaṃbhamāno 'lakṣaṇāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati sa tayā dhyānapāramitayā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati.
S06psp_6-8u:684: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:685: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitayā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati.
S06psp_6-8u:687_0: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ suśikṣito bahirdhāśūnyatāyām
S06psp_6-8u:687_1: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ suśikṣito na ceha śūnyatāsu
S06psp_6-8u:688: srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vānāgāmiphale vārhattve vā pratyekabuddhatve vā yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vā sāpi śūnyā śūnyatayā,
S06psp_6-8u:695: sarvaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopalaṃbha ātmaḥ sarvānupalaṃbho niyāmaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:702: cakṣur upalaṃbhaḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana upalaṃbho,
S06psp_6-8u:706: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur upalaṃbhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:708: avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhāvo jātir jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā upalaṃbhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:709_0: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny
S06psp_6-8u:712: niyāmaḥ punaḥ subhūte yatraiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravyāhāro nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:713_0: rūpasya vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya
S06psp_6-8u:713_1: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ vā sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvabodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām
S06psp_6-8u:714: tathā hi subhūte rūpasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāro vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:715: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ vā yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ (PSP_6-8:38)
S06psp_6-8u:716: sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvabodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:717_1: so 'pravyāhāraḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñānāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāro daśānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:721: niyāmam akrānto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samādhiparipūrṇo na samāpattivaśenopapadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:722_0: prāg eva rāgaṃ vā doṣaṃ vā mohaṃ votpādayed yatra sthitvā tat karmābhisaṃskuryād
S06psp_6-8u:722_1: yena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa caturṇāṃ dhyānānām anyatamenopapadyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate
S06psp_6-8u:722_2: 'nyatra māyopameṣu sthitvā sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti na ca sattvānupalabhamānaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:722_3: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:722_4: mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrya yāvad dharmacakraṃ pravartayati,
S06psp_6-8u:724_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopamān
S06psp_6-8u:724_1: dharmān parijānāti pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān
S06psp_6-8u:726: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:727: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnopamān sarvadharmān parijānāti?
S06psp_6-8u:728: pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca sarvadharmān parijānāti?
S06psp_6-8u:730: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na svapnaṃ na svapnadarśinaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:734: na marīciṃ na marīcidarśinaṃ, na māyāṃ na (PSP_6-8:39)
S06psp_6-8u:737: na gandharvanagaraṃ na gandharvanagaradarśinaṃ ca paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:739_0: pratiśrutkā viparyāsaḥ pratibhāso viparyāsaḥ pratibiṃbaṃ viparyāso marīcir viparyāso
S06psp_6-8u:739_1: māyā viparyāso nirmitako viparyāso gandharvanagaraṃ viparyāsa eṣa bālapṛthagjanānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:739_2: punar nāpi svapnadarśanaṃ nāpi svapnadarśī na pratiśrutkādarśanaṃ nāpi pratiśrutkādarśī
S06psp_6-8u:745: evaṃ yāvan nārhan na pratyekabuddho na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:746_0: tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā asadbhūtā ye 'bhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās
S06psp_6-8u:746_1: te pariniṣpannās tatra kiṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bhāvasaṃjñī
S06psp_6-8u:746_2: bhaviṣyati pariniṣpannasaṃjñī vāsadbhūtasaṃjñī vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:747: na sā prajñāpāramitā syād yadi kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvo bhavet pariniṣpattir vā sadbhūtatā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:748: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na rūpe sajjati,
S06psp_6-8u:749: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sajjati,
S06psp_6-8u:752: na kāmadhātau na rūpadhātau nārūpyadhātau sajjati,
S06psp_6-8u:759: na sajjati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:760: tatra cchandarāgaṃ notpādayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:762: tat kiṃ tatra cchandarāgaṃ kariṣyaty evaṃ dvitīyāṃ bhūmiṃ tṛtīyāṃ bhūmiñ caturthāṃ bhūmiṃ pañcamīṃ bhūmiṃ (PSP_6-8:40)
S06psp_6-8u:763: ṣaṣṭhīṃ bhūmiṃ saptamīṃ bhūmim aṣṭamīṃ bhūmiṃ navamīṃ bhūmiṃ daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:764: tatra cchandarāgaṃ notpādayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:765: tathā hi sa tā bhūmīr nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:767: evaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau caran sarvadharmāś ca tatra prajñāpāramitāyām antargatān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:768: tāṃś ca sarvadharmān nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:769: tathā hi te sarvadharmāḥ sā ca prajñāpāramitādvayādvaidhīkārāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:770: tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścid bhedo 'sti dharmadhātunirdeśena tathatānirdeśena bhūtakoṭinirdeśenāsaṃbhinnāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:771: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:772: yadi bhagavānn asaṃbhinnatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ tatra kathaṃ kuśaladharmanirdeśo bhavati sāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāñ ca dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:773: laukikalokottarāṇāṃ vā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati.
S06psp_6-8u:776_0: subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā kasyacid dharmasya pravyāhāraḥ saṃskṛtasya vāsaṃskṛtasya
S06psp_6-8u:776_1: vā srotaāpattiphalasya vā sakṛdāgāmiphalasya vānāgāmiphalasya vārhattvasya vā pratyekabodher
S06psp_6-8u:781: asaṃbhinnāḥ sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā anutpannā avinirbhogāḥ sarvadharmā na mayā subhūte sarvāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā,
S06psp_6-8u:782: kaścid dharmopalabdho rūpam iti vā vedaneti vā saṃjñeti vā saṃskārā iti vā vijñānam iti vā skandhadhātvāyatanānīti vā pratītyasamutpannā iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:783: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānīti vā kāmadhātur vā rūpadhātur vārūpyadhātur vā,
S06psp_6-8u:784_0: kuśalākuśalā vā dharmāḥ sāsravā vānāsravā vā sāvadyā vānavadyā vā saṃskṛtam iti vāsaṃskṛtam
S06psp_6-8u:784_1: iti vā yāvac chrotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā
S06psp_6-8u:784_2: pratyekabodhir vā bodhisattvatā vā samyaksaṃbodhir vā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:784_3: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:786: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāve kuśalena bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:790: yatra sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvān vinayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:791: ye vinītatvās triṣu bhaveṣu na dṛśyante,
S06psp_6-8u:792: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam alakṣaṇayogena.
S06psp_6-8u:795: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyām ekakṣaṇābhisamayādhikāraḥ śikṣāparisamāptiparivartaḥ saptamaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:799_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣām eva svapnopamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇām avastukānām abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:799_1: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ sarvākārapariśuddhānām anāśravāṇāṃ yā prakṛtir ekalakṣaṇā yad
S06psp_6-8u:799_2: utālakṣaṇā sa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho veditavyaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
S06psp_6-8u:801: katame punas te bhagavann anāsravāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:803_0: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmāś catvāry apramāṇāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo
S06psp_6-8u:803_1: daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni aṣṭāv abhinnāyatanāni araṇasamādhiḥ praṇidhijñānam ṣaḍ abhijñāś
S06psp_6-8u:803_2: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayo daśa pāramiā daśabalāni catvāri
S06psp_6-8u:803_3: vaiśāradyāni trīṇy akṣarāṇi trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni asaṃpramoṣadharmatā vāsanāsamudghāto
S06psp_6-8u:803_4: mahākaruṇā sarvākārajñatā mārgākārajñatā sarvajñatā ca ime ucyante subhūte anāsravāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:803_5: sarvadharmā iti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāip śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:805_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā teṣām eva dharmāṇām adhigamād anuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:805_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇair
S06psp_6-8u:805_2: aśītyā cānuvyañjanair alaṃkṛtakāyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:805_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:807_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā teṣām eva sarvadharmāṇām avigamenānuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:807_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣv anantāparyanteṣu
S06psp_6-8u:808: sarvakālan nānānirmāṇameghena sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:810: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:811: kathaṃ bhagavan svapnopamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇām avastukānām abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:812: ime kuśalā ime 'kuśalā ime laukikā ime lokottarā ime sāsravā ime 'nāsravā ime saṃskṛtā ime 'saṃskṛtā ime srotraāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai saṃvartante,
S06psp_6-8u:818_2: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ vyavasthānam ime kuśalā ime 'kuśalā ime laukikā ime lokottarā
S06psp_6-8u:818_3: ime sāsravā ime 'nāsravā ime saṃskṛtā ime 'saṃskṛtā ime srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai saṃvartante,
S06psp_6-8u:824: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:825: iha subhūte bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ svapnam upalabhate svapnadarśinam upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:837_0: kāyena vācā manasā puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyān abhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskaroti. kāyena vācā manasā
S06psp_6-8u:837_1: tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dvayoḥ śūnyatayoḥ sthitvātyantaśunyatāyām
S06psp_6-8u:838_0: śūnyam idaṃ traidhātukaṃ nāsty atra rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:838_1: vā skandhā vā dhātavo vāyatanāni vā pratiśrutkaiṣā pratibhāsa eṣa marīcir eṣā nirmitaka
S06psp_6-8u:838_2: eṣa gandharvanagaram etan nāsty atra rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:838_3: vā skandhadhātavo vāyatanāni vā nāsty atra svapno na svapnasya draṣṭā,
S06psp_6-8u:846: 'pi tu sarva ete dharmā avastukā abhāvasvabhāvās tatra bhavanto 'skandhe skandhasaṃjñinaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:848: api tu khalu punaḥ pratītyasamutpannā ete sarvadharmā viparyāsasamutthitāḥ karmavipākaparigṛhītāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:849: kiṃ punar yūyam avastukeṣu dharmeṣu vastusaṃjñām utpādayathaivaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye matsariṇaḥ sattvās tān mātsaryān nivartayati,
S06psp_6-8u:851: teṣāñ ca sa dānaparityāgo mahābhogatāyai saṃvartate,
S06psp_6-8u:854: teṣāṃ sa śīlasamādānajaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ svargopapattaye bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:855: sa tāṃs tata uccālya samādhau niyojayati sa teṣāṃ samāpattijaḥ puṇyaskandho brahmalokopapāttaye bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:856_0: evaṃ prathamād dhyānād dvitīye dhyāne dvitīyād dhyānāt tṛtīye dhyāne tṛtīyād dhyānāc
S06psp_6-8u:856_1: caturthe dhyāne caturthād dhyānād ūrdhvam ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattāv
S06psp_6-8u:857: sa tasmād api dānād dānaphalāc cānekaparyāyaṃ (PSP_6-8:46)
S06psp_6-8u:859: sa tasmāc chīlāc chīlaphalāc cānekaparyāyaṃ vivecyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:860: sa tebhyo dhyānebhyo dhyānaphalebhyaś ca samāpattibhyaḥ samāpattiphalebhyaś cānekaparyāyaṃ vivecyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:861_0: evaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcasv
S06psp_6-8u:861_1: indriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu āryāṣṭāṅgikamārge triṣu vimokṣamukheṣv
S06psp_6-8u:861_2: aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu
S06psp_6-8u:861_3: vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu niveśayati
S06psp_6-8u:862: sa ebhir anāsravair dharmair arūpibhir anidarśanair apratighair ye srotraāpattiphale sthāsyanti tān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:863: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale sthāsyanti tān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:866: ye pratyekabodhau sthāsyanti tān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:868: teṣāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ bodhimārgam ākhyāti upadiśati samuttejayati,
S06psp_6-8u:871: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavanatam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:872: āścaryam etat bhagavann adbhuto dharmo yatra hi nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:873: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇām atyantaśūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:874_0: ime kuśalā dharmā ime 'kuśalā dharmā ime laukikā dharmā ime lokottarā dharmā ime
S06psp_6-8u:874_1: sāsravā dharmā ime 'nāsravā dharmā ime sāvadyā dharmā ime 'navadyā dharmā ime saṃskṛtā
S06psp_6-8u:875: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:876_0: evam etat subhūte evam etat āścaryam idaṃ subhūte paramāścaryam idaṃ bodhisattvasya
S06psp_6-8u:876_1: mahāsattvasyādbhuto dharmo yad iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:877: sacet tvaṃ subhūte jānīyā yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāścaryādbhuto dharmas (PSP_6-8:47)
S06psp_6-8u:878_0: taṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā api ca evam api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na sukaraḥ
S06psp_6-8u:878_1: pratikāraḥ kartuṃ tad yuṣmābhiḥ sarvair bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na śakyaḥ sarvadharmā bhāvayituṃ syāt.
S06psp_6-8u:879: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:880: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāścaryādbhūto dharmo yo na śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ saṃvidyate?
S06psp_6-8u:882: tena hi subhūte śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhuś ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te,
S06psp_6-8u:883: evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīd,
S06psp_6-8u:885_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vipākajāsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
S06psp_6-8u:885_1: sthitvā pañcasv abhijñāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu dhāraṇīmukheṣu catasṛṣu
S06psp_6-8u:885_2: pratisaṃvitsu sthitvā daśadiglokadhātuṣu ye sattvā dānenānugrahītavyās tān dānenānugṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:886: ye śīlena ye kṣāntyā ye vīryeṇa ye dhyānena ye prajñayā ye prathamena dhyānena ye dvitīyena dhyānena ye tṛtīyena dhyānena ye caturthena dhyānena,
S06psp_6-8u:887: ye ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattyā ye vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattyā ye ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattyā ye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattyānugrahītavyās tān anugṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:888: ye maitryānugrahītavyā ye karuṇayā ye muditayā ye upekṣayā ye caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:893: ye saptabhir bodhyaṅgair ye āryāṣṭāṅgikena mārgeṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:894: ye śūnyatayā ye ānimittena ye 'praṇihitena samādhinānugrahītavyās tān śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhibhir anugṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:896: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānena sattvān anugṛhṇāti?
S06psp_6-8u:898: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāty annam annārthikebhyo dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:900_1: sakṛdāgāmibhyaḥ srotaāpannebhyaḥ samyaggatebhyaḥ samyakpratipannebhyas tathāiva tiryagyonigatebhyaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:900_2: sarvebhyo 'nānātvena dānan dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:901: tathā hy anānātvaṃ sarvadharmaṃ jñātvā anānātvaṃ dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:902: anānātvaṃ dānaṃ datvā anānātvasya dharmasya lābhī bhavati yad uta sarvākārajñatāyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:903: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ cittam utpadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:904: samyaksaṃbuddhā me dakṣiṇīyā na tiryagyonigatā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:905: na bodhisattvadharmo bhavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:906_0: na hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhāya cittam utpādyaivam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_6-8u:906_1: saṃprasthita ime mayā sattvā dānenānugrahītavyā ime mayā sattvā dānenānugrahītavyā iti cintayati,
S06psp_6-8u:910: tenaiva ca dānānugraheṇa tribhir yānair anupariśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:911: saced ete bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ janapadabalakāyā avadhyāyeran tena nānyathācittam utpādayitavyaṃ dāsyāmi vā na vā,
S06psp_6-8u:912: api tu akopitamānasena janapadabalakāyebhyo dānaṃ dātavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:913_0: tathā hi tasya janapadabalakāyasyārthāyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:913_1: evaṃ ca punar vikalpayed garhyo bhaveyaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:913_2: mahāsattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānām arhatāṃ śaikṣāṇāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurasya ca lokasya
S06psp_6-8u:913_3: kenāyam adhīṣṭaḥ sarvasattvānām ahaṃ trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmi parāyaṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇam iti.
S06psp_6-8u:914: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā manuṣyabhūtā vāmanuṣyabhūtā vāgatyāṅgapratyaṅgāni yāceran,
S06psp_6-8u:916: dāsyāmi vā na dāsyāmi vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:917: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvānām arthāya sañcintya āśrayaḥ parigṛhīto 'nena mayātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:918: tenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yeṣām arthe mayātmabhāva upāttas te 'yācitakam eva gṛhītvā gacchantu. evaṃ khalu (PSP_6-8:49)
S06psp_6-8u:919: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:920: tathā hy ete dharmā atyantaśūnyatayā śūnyā na hi śūnyatā kasmaicid dadāti vā cchinatti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:921: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:922: yad utādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dātavyaṃ satatasamitam.
S06psp_6-8u:923: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
S06psp_6-8u:929: so 'nayā dānapāramitayā paripūryā vā hy adhyātmikeṣu dharmeṣu cchidyamāneṣu evaṃ cittam utpādayiṣyati ko me cchinatti vā bhinatti vā.
S06psp_6-8u:931_0: ihāhaṃ subhūte paśyāmi buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:931_1: lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān saṃcintya mahānirayaṃ patitvā tāni mahānirayaduḥkhāny
S06psp_6-8u:931_2: upaśāmya tribhiḥ prātihāryais teṣāṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayato yad uta
S06psp_6-8u:934_0: anuśāsanīprātihāryeṇa ca te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā mahāmuditayā
S06psp_6-8u:934_1: mahopekṣayā ca dharmaṃ deśayanti. tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:934_2: mahāsattvānām antike cittam atiprasādya tebhyo nirayebhyo vyuttiṣṭhanti,
S06psp_6-8u:935: tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāyānupūrveṇa tribhir yānair duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:936_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād anuvidikṣu lokadhatuṣu
S06psp_6-8u:936_1: buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan paśyāmi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān
S06psp_6-8u:936_2: mahāsattvān sañcintya mahāniraye patitvā tāni mahānirayaduḥkhāny upaśāmya tribhiḥ
S06psp_6-8u:936_3: prātihāryais teṣāṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayato yad uta ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa
S06psp_6-8u:937: vā ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa ca tāni mahānirayaduḥkhāny upaśāmya ādeśanāprātihāryeṇa dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:938: anuśāsanīprātihāryeṇa ca te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā mahāmuditayā mahopekṣayā ca dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:939_0: tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antike cittam abhiprasādya
S06psp_6-8u:939_1: tebhyo nirayebhyo vyuttiṣṭhanti tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāyānupūrveṇa tribhir yānair
