S06psp_6-8u:2114_2: āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu mā etān dharmān dvayato manasikuru mādvayataḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2115: prakṛtiśūnyā hy ete dharmā na hi prakṛtiśūnyatā dvayato mānasikartavyā nādvayataḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2116: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2121: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānām arthaṃ karoty upāyakauśalyena dhyānabhāvanāyām evāvatārayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2122: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dhyānaṃ bhāvaya mā ca vikṣepasaṃjñī bhava. tat kasya hetoh?
S06psp_6-8u:2123: prakṛtiśūnyā hy ete dharmā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yo vikṣepyate vā ekāgrī bhavati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2124: sa tvam atra dhyāne sthitvā yad yad evaṃ kuśalaṃ karma kariṣyasi kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2125: yadi vā dānan dāsyasi yadi vā śīlaṃ rakṣasi yadi vā kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2126: yadi vā vīryam ārabhase yadi vā dhyānam utpādayiṣyasi yadi vā prajñā bhāvayiṣyasi,
S06psp_6-8u:2129_0: yadi vāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamādhisamāpattīr yadi vābhijñā yadi vā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisamvido
S06psp_6-8u:2129_1: yadi vā mahāmaitrī yadi vā mahākaruṇā yadi vāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān yadi vā
S06psp_6-8u:2129_2: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni yadi vāśītyanuvyañjanāni yadi vā śrāvakamārgaṃ yadi
S06psp_6-8u:2129_3: vā pratyekabuddhamārgaṃ yadi vā bodhisattvamārgaṃ yadi vā buddhamārgaṃ yadi vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2129_4: yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ yadi vānāgāmiphalaṃ yadi vārhattvaṃ yadi vā pratyekabodhiṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2130: sarvākārajñatāṃ yadi vā sattvān paripācayiṣyasi yadi vā buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyasi,
S06psp_6-8u:2131: tasya te ime kuśalā dharmā alpakṛcchreṇa prādurbhaviṣyanti prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ carataḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2132: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2134: kiṃ kuśalagaveṣī sattvānām arthaṃ kurvan buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ satatasamitaṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:2136: yaṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2137_0: sa tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi na jātu vipraṇakṣyati yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_6-8u:2137_1: abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syād dhāraṇīpratilabdhaś ca satatasamitaṃ bhavaty ahīṇendriyo yadi
S06psp_6-8u:2137_2: vā kāyendriyeṇa yadi vā vāgindriyeṇa yadi vā manaindriyeṇa.
S06psp_6-8u:2139: tathā hi sarvākārajñatāṃ satatasamitaṃ bhāvayaty anayā sarvākārajñatayā subhāvitayā sarvamārgāḥ subhāvitā bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2140: yadi vā śrāvakamārgo yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārgo yadi vā bodhisattvamārgas tasyābhijñā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitam upakārībhūtā bhaviṣyanty avipraṇāśayogeṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:2141: sa tāsu vaipākikīṣv abhijñāsu sthitvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti na parihīyate pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃsarann,
S06psp_6-8u:2142: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvopāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06psp_6-8u:2143: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvopāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2144: sa tayā prajñāpāramitayā subhāvitayā sattvān evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:2145_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra yad yad evaṃ karma karoṣi kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā tat sarvam
S06psp_6-8u:2145_1: amṛtādhigamāya pariṇāmaya tathā te ete dharmāḥ sarva amṛtāvigamāya bhaviṣyanty amṛtaparyavasānāya ca,
S06psp_6-8u:2146: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharmo 'bhiniviśate yaḥ parihīyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2148: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāḥ kaścit parihīyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2149: tathā hi prakṛtiśūnyatā na bhāvo nābhāvas tat kim abhāvo 'bhāve dharme parihāsyaty,
S06psp_6-8u:2151: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:2152: sa evam avavadann evam anuśāsan na jātv akarmako 'bhūt,
S06psp_6-8u:2153: sa ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vartate,
S06psp_6-8u:2154_0: parāṃś ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayaty evaṃ pañcasu śikṣāpadeṣu āryāṣṭāṅge
S06psp_6-8u:2154_1: samanvāgata upoṣadhe. ātmanā ca dhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate parāṃś ca dhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2155: ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihāre samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2156: ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ karuṇāvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitaṃ karuṇāvihāre samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2159: ātmanā ca satatasamitam upekṣāvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitam upekṣāvihāre samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2160: ātmanā ca smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān bhāvayanti parāṃś ca smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2161: ātmanā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāvayati parāṃś ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2162: ātmanā ca sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu ca śikṣate parāṃś ca sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvapāramitāsu ca samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2163: ātmanā ca daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu śikṣate parāṃś ca daśabalavaiśāradyapratisamvidāvenikabuddhadharmeṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2164: ātmanā ca dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanāni paripūrayati parāṃś ca dvātriṃsanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanapariniṣpattaye samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2166: jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2167: ātmanā ca sakṛdāgāmiphale jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2168: ātmanā cānāgāmiphale jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś cānāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2169: ātmanā cārhattve jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś cārhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2170: ātmanā ca pratyekabodhau jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2171: ātmanā cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau mārgam utpādayati parāṃś ca tatra mārge 'vavadaty anuśāsti pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ khalu (PSP_6-8:96)
S06psp_6-8u:2172: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacaryāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena na jātv akarmako 'bhūt.
S06psp_6-8u:2173: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2174: yadi bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvā upalabhyante,
S06psp_6-8u:2176: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisaṃpratiṣṭhate?
S06psp_6-8u:2177: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2179: yathā vadasi prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvā upalabhyante na dharmo nādharmaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2180: yadi punaḥ subhūte prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā abhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyām abhisaṃprāsthāsyad,
S06psp_6-8u:2181: evaṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya prakṛtiśūnyaṃ dharmaṃ deśayed,
S06psp_6-8u:2184: vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pañcaskandhāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2185: dvādaśāyatanāny aṣṭādaśadhātavaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2186_0: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
S06psp_6-8u:2186_1: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni
S06psp_6-8u:2187_0: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni
S06psp_6-8u:2187_1: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
S06psp_6-8u:2189: sarvākārajñatā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇaṃ prakṛtiśūnyam iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2190: yadi punaḥ subhūte 'dhyātmaśūnyatā na prakṛtiśūnyābhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ dharmam uddekṣyad,
S06psp_6-8u:2191: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na prakṛtiśūnyābhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ dharmam uddekṣyan,
S06psp_6-8u:2192: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatā vinaśyati na ca kūṭasthā bhavati na ca sā punar apakrāmati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2193: na hi sā deśasthā na pradeśasthā na ca sā kvacid gacchati nāpi (PSP_6-8:97)
S06psp_6-8u:2196: yatra na kasyacid dharmasyācayo vā upacayo vopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2197: hānir vā vṛddhir vā utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā eṣā sā prakṛtidharmāṇāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2198: yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhuṃ saṃprasthitā na kasyacid dharmasya prasthāne paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2201: yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān prakṛtiśūnyān dṛṣṭvā na pratyudāvartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2202: tathā hi na kasyacid dharmasyāvaraṇaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2205_0: yatra prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ na sattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñaptir nātmā na sattvo
S06psp_6-8u:2205_1: na jīvo na jantur na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako
S06psp_6-8u:2206: na rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam upalabhyate yāvat sarvadharmā nādhyātmā na bahirdhā nādhyātmabahirdhā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2209: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmitasya bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā bodhisattvo vānuprabandhaṃ kalpaṃ śatasahasraṃ dharmaṃ deśayet,
S06psp_6-8u:2211: subhūte api nu te nirmitā bhavyāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā prāpayituṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2213: anāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāpayitum arhattvaṃ vā prāpayitum,
S06psp_6-8u:2217: tathā hi teṣāṃ bhagavan vastu nāsti.
S06psp_6-8u:2220_0: avastukānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ sa sattvo yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niveśayati
S06psp_6-8u:2220_1: pratiṣṭhāpayati srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vānāgāmiphale vā arhattve vā
S06psp_6-8u:2221: 'nyatra vipacyā sāpannāyāḥ saṃjñāyā aviparyāse niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2222: yaś cāsau viparyāsaḥ sa evāviparyāsaḥ kalpanābhiṣyandam upādāyāvikalpaś cāviparyāso,
S06psp_6-8u:2223_0: yatrāvikalpas tatra viparyāso nāsti na tatrātmā na sattvo na jīvo na jantur na poṣo
S06psp_6-8u:2223_1: na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyako
S06psp_6-8u:2223_2: na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2223_3: na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na tatra pāramitā na śūnyatāmukhāni na bodhipakṣyā dharmā
S06psp_6-8u:2224: eṣā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati caraṃs tāṃś ca viparyastān sattvān sattvasaṃjñāyā mocayaty,
S06psp_6-8u:2227_0: ye 'pi te anāsravā dharmās tad yathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni
S06psp_6-8u:2227_1: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ so
S06psp_6-8u:2227_2: 'pi na tasya yathā na paramārtho yad utāsaṃskṛtam anutpādo 'prādurbhāvo 'bhāvaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2229_0: eṣā sā sarvabuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhir yatra na jīvo na jantur na poṣo na puruṣo
S06psp_6-8u:2229_1: na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyako na rūpaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2229_2: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā
S06psp_6-8u:2229_3: na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na pāramitā na śūnyatāmukhāni na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_6-8u:2229_5: na mahākaruṇā na dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny aśītyanuvyañjanāni na hi bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:2229_6: mahāsattvo mārgasya kṛtaśo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito 'nyatra prakṛtiśūnyatā
S06psp_6-8u:2229_7: parijñānārthaṃ sā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā pūrvaṃ vā paścād vā madhye vā na jātu sāprakṛtiśūnyatā
S06psp_6-8u:2229_8: tatra prakṛtiśūnyatā pāramitāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ (PSP_6-8:99)
S06psp_6-8u:2230: sattvān sattvasaṃjñinaḥ sattvasaṃjñāyā mocanārthaṃ mārgajñatāyāṃ carati sa mārgajñatāyāṃ caran sarvamārgeṣu caran sarvamārgeṣu carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2232: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhyāyuḥsaṃskārān adhiṣṭhāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2235: eṣā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhanetrī yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2236: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantas teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyam eva buddhanetrī yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2237: ye 'pi te 'nāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti buddhā bhagavantaḥ teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyam eva buddhanetrī yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2238: ye 'pi te etarhi daśadiglokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2239: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyam eva buddhanetrī yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2241: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ teṣāṃ cāntike tathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prakṛtiśūnyatā pāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2244: āścaryam idaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yatra nāma ime prakṛtiśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu caranti,
S06psp_6-8u:2245: tāṃ ca prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ na vikopayatīty anyad rūpam anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2246: anyā vedanā anyā saṃjñā anye saṃskārā,
S06psp_6-8u:2249: anyā pāramitā anyāni śūnyatāmukhāny anye bodhipakṣyā dharmā anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2254: prakṛtiśūnyataivānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir eva prakṛtiśūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:2256: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2257: yadi subhūte 'nyad rūpaṃ syād anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2258: anyā vedanā anyā saṃjñā anye saṃskārā,
S06psp_6-8u:2266: na subhūte rūpaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2267: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃbhotsyate. yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2271_0: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_6-8u:2271_1: sarvavimokṣāḥ sarvasamāpattayaḥ sarvābhijñāḥ sarvāṇi dhyānāni sarvāṇy apramāṇāni
S06psp_6-8u:2271_2: sarvā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvatathāgatabalāni sarvabodhisattvabhūmayaś catvāri vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_6-8u:2273: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaṃ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃbudhyeta,
S06psp_6-8u:2276: yāvad bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃbudhyeta. yasmāt subhūte prakṛtiśūnyataiva rūpaṃ rūpam eva prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2280: tasmāt subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyān sarvadharmān viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ pratiṣṭhet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2281: na hi tatra kaścid dharmo vinaśyati vā kūṭastho vā bhavaty avakrāmati vānyatra sadevako lokaḥ samārakaḥ sabrahmakaḥ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikā prajāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2283: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān,
S06psp_6-8u:2289: caranti te 'haṃkāramamakārāv abhiniviśyādhyātmikabāhyāni vastūni abhiniviśanta upalabhante,
S06psp_6-8u:2291: vedanāṃ vedanātvena saṃjñāṃ saṃjñātvena saṃskārān saṃskāratvena,
S06psp_6-8u:2293: te na parimucyante jātyā jarayā maraṇena śokena paridevena duḥkhena daurmanasyena na parimucyante,
S06psp_6-8u:2295: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā rūpaṃ na vikopayati śūnyam iti vāśūnyam iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2297: vijñānaṃ na vikopayati śūnyam iti vāśūnyam iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2299_1: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06psp_6-8u:2299_2: na vikopayati śūnyā iti vāśūnyā iti vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2300: na hi śūnyatā vikopayatīdaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vedanā iyaṃ saṃjñā ime saṃskārā,
S06psp_6-8u:2301: idaṃ vijñānam ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā imāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni,
S06psp_6-8u:2302: iyaṃ śūnyatā ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā imāny āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06psp_6-8u:2303: imāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā ime daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā iyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nākāśam ākāśaṃ vikopayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2304: adhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā na cādhyātmikam ākāśaṃ bāhyam ākāśaṃ vikopayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2305: na ca bāhyam ākāśam ādhyātmikam ākāśaṃ vikopayaty,
S06psp_6-8u:2306: evaṃ eva subhūte na rūpaṃ śūnyatāṃ vikopayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2307: na ca śūnyatā rūpaṃ vikopayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2308: na hi tasya svabhāvo 'sti ya evaṃ vikopayaty ayaṃ śūnyo 'yaṃ na śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2310: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2311: yadi bhagavan na bhedaḥ sarvadhrmāṇāṃ kuto bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃprasthito bhavaty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ? na (PSP_6-8:102)
S06psp_6-8u:2316: na dvayacaritasya bodhir na dvaidhīkārā bodhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2318: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dvaidhīkāreṇa carati bodhau,
S06psp_6-8u:2319: naiva ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhī rūpe carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2320: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06psp_6-8u:2322: na skandhadhātvāyataneṣu carati na pratītyasamutpādeṣu carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2330: na samyaksaṃbodhau carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2331: na hi bodhir aham iti śabdo rūpe carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2333: na bodhir aham iti śabdo vijñāne carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2334: evaṃ yāvan na bodhir aham iti śabdaḥ samyaksaṃbodhau carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2335: na bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya samyaksaṃbodhir udgrahe carati.
S06psp_6-8u:2336: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2337: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir nodgrahe carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2338: kutra tarhi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhiś carati?
S06psp_6-8u:2341: subhūte kutra tathāgatanirmitasya buddhiś caraty udgrahe vānudgrahe vā.
S06psp_6-8u:2346: subhūte 'rhataḥ svapnāntaragatasya kutra buddhiś caraty udgrahe vānudgrahe vā.
S06psp_6-8u:2349: yadā bhagavann atyanto 'rhan na svapiti kutaḥ svapne buddhiś caraty udgrahe vānudgrahe vā?
S06psp_6-8u:2351: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na bodhir udgrahe vānudgrahe vā carati.
S06psp_6-8u:2352: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2353: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhir nodgrahe vānudgrahe vā carati na (PSP_6-8:103)
S06psp_6-8u:2354: rūpe na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2355_0: na skandhadhātvāyataneṣu na pratītyasamutpādeṣu na pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na pāramitāsu
S06psp_6-8u:2355_3: na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carati. kathaṃ punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2355_4: caritvā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu sarvaśūnyatāsu dhyāneṣv
S06psp_6-8u:2355_8: abhijñāsu sthitvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhya sattvāṃś
S06psp_6-8u:2355_9: ca paripācya sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbhotsyate. na ca bhagavann asthitvā daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2355_10: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2355_12: pañcasv abhijñāsv asthitvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetrañ cāpariśodhya
S06psp_6-8u:2359_0: na śakyāparipūrayitvā daśabodhisattvabhūmīr daśapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān
S06psp_6-8u:2360: paripūrayitvā punaḥ subhūte śakyā daśabhūmīr daśapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra (PSP_6-8:104)
S06psp_6-8u:2361_1: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni yāvad aśītyanuvyañjanāni mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇāṃ mahāmuditāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2362: tat punaḥ subhūte rūpaprakṛtau sthitvā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,
S06psp_6-8u:2363_0: vijñānaprakṛtau sthitvā yāvad bodhiprakṛtau sthitvā sā ca prakṛtir upaśāntā na kasyacid
S06psp_6-8u:2363_1: dharmasyopacayaṃ vā karoty apacayaṃ vā karoty utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā ucchedaṃ vā
S06psp_6-8u:2363_2: śāśvataṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā prāptiṃ vābhisamayaṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:2365: sa khalu subhūte lokavyavahāraprajñaptidharmam upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2366: na punar atra paramārthaṃ kaścid asti rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2367_0: vijñānaṃ vā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā pāramitā
S06psp_6-8u:2367_1: vā śūnyatā vā bodhipakṣyā vā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_6-8u:2367_3: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir yo vānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau caret,
S06psp_6-8u:2368: sarva ete dharmā lokavyavahāram upādāya prajñaptā na punaḥ paramārthena. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhaye carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2369: na punas tac cittam upalabhate na sattvaṃ na bodhiṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2371: subhūte yasmin samaye subhūtinā kleśāḥ prahīnā indriyāṇi pratilabdhāni,
S06psp_6-8u:2372: ānantaryaś ca samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā prāptaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāptam anāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāptaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā prāptam,
S06psp_6-8u:2373: api nu tasmin samaye svapna upalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2378: tat kathaṃ subhūtināmnā sthavireṇa tvayārhattvaṃ prāptam iti prajñaptam?
S06psp_6-8u:2383: evam etat subhūte lokavyavahāreṇa bodhisattvaḥ prajñapto lokavyavahāreṇa rūpaṃ prajñaptaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2385_1: ca prajñaptāni lokavyavahāreṇa sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmā
S06psp_6-8u:2386_0: na punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena samyaksaṃbodhau kaścid dharma upalabdho yasya
S06psp_6-8u:2386_1: dharmasyopacayaṃ vāpacayaṃ vā kuryād upakāraṃ vāpakāraṃ vā kuryād dharmāṇāṃ prakṛtim
S06psp_6-8u:2391: yāvat sarvadharmān upalapsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2392: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06psp_6-8u:2394: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2395_0: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃsatsu
S06psp_6-8u:2395_1: bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv
S06psp_6-8u:2395_2: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran bodhimārgañ ca pariśodhyābhavyo 'nuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2396: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06psp_6-8u:2398: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2400: na dānapratigrāhakan nāpy anyatraiteṣu dharmeṣu carati, (PSP_6-8:106)
S06psp_6-8u:2401: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo utsahate bodhimārge caritum,
S06psp_6-8u:2402: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2403: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na ca prajñām upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2404: yo vā bhāvayed yad vā bhāvayet tad api nopalabhate nāpy anyatraiteṣu dharmeṣu carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2405_0: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva utsahate bodhimārge caritum. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:2405_1: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2406: evaṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran buddhadharmān na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2407: yo vā bhāvayati yad vā bhāvayati tad api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2409: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva utsahate bodhimārge caritum,
S06psp_6-8u:2410: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_6-8u:2411: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2412: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dāne yogam āpadyate?
S06psp_6-8u:2413: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2414: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann upāyakauśalyena rūpaṃ na yojayati na viyojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2415: tathā hi rūpasya svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2417: vijñānaṃ na yojayati na viyojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2418: tathā hi vijñānasya svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2419: evaṃ na dānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na vīryapāramitā na dhyānapāramitā na prajñāpāramitā yojayati na viyojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2420: tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2421_0: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
S06psp_6-8u:2421_1: dharmā nādhyātmaśūnyatā na bahirdhāśūnyatā nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
S06psp_6-8u:2422: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni na vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni nābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā yojayanti na viyojayanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2423: tathā hi buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā.
S06psp_6-8u:2425: yadi bhagavan na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2428: na hy aśikṣitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śakyā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum.
S06psp_6-8u:2431: yathā vadasi na śakyāśikṣitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbodhuṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2432: yadi khalūpāyakauśalyena śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvam upalabhate gṛhṇāti. atha na labhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2434: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā iyaṃ śīlapāramitā iyaṃ dānapāramitā,
S06psp_6-8u:2435: idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vedanā iyaṃ saṃjñā ime saṃskārā idaṃ vijñānam ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2436: imāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni imāḥ pāramitā imāḥ śūnyatā ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā imāny āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06psp_6-8u:2440: tat kiṃ grahīṣyaty agrāhyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_6-8u:2450: iyaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitāgrāhyapāramitā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_6-8u:2451: atra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yatra śikṣamāṇo bodhiattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣām api na lapsyate, (PSP_6-8:108)
S06psp_6-8u:2452_0: kutaḥ punar bodhiṃ kutaḥ punaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ kutaḥ punar bodhisattvadharmān kutaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2452_1: punaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmān kutaḥ punaḥ śrāvakadharmān kutaḥ punaḥ pṛthagjanadharmān. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2453: tathā hi śāriputra na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvo vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2454_0: evam abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ pṛthagjanadharmaḥ katamaḥ srotaāpannaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2454_1: katamaḥ sakṛdāgāmī katamo 'nāgāmī katamo 'rhan katamaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ katamo bodhisattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2457: yeṣu dharmeṣu nirdiśyate pṛthagjano vā srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vānāgāmī vārhan vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā samyaksaṃbuddho vā.
S06psp_6-8u:2459: avastukānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ kutaḥ āgamaḥ prajñāyate?
S06psp_6-8u:2460: ayaṃ pṛthagjano 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2461: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2462: kiṃ nu śāriputra rūpasya vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2465: naitat sugatānyatra viparyastaś cittaḥ pṛthagjano rūpam ity abhiniviṣṭo,
S06psp_6-8u:2468: kiṃ nu śāriputra vijñānasya vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2471: naitat sugatānyatra viparyastacittaḥ pṛthagjano vijñānam ity abhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2473: kiṃ punaḥ śāriputra yāvat sarvadharmāṇāṃ vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthakjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2475: no bhagavan naitat sugatānyatra viparyastacittaḥ pṛthagjano yāvat sarvadharmā ity abhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2477: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenāvastukān dharmān paśyann (PSP_6-8:109)
S06psp_6-8u:2480: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2481: katamaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyenāvastukān sarvadharmān paśyann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2482: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2483: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kasyacid dharmasya vastu samanupaśyati yatra vastūni pratihanyeta,
S06psp_6-8u:2484: yatra pratihanyamāna ālīyeta ālīyamānaḥ saṃsīdet kauśīdyam āpadyeta,
S06psp_6-8u:2485: tasmāt tarhi śāriputra avastukā ajīvā nirjīvā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2486_0: anyatra samohena sattvā abhiniviṣṭāḥ skandheṣu vā dhātuṣu vā āyataneṣu vā pratītyasamutpādeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2486_1: pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu vā tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvān
S06psp_6-8u:2486_2: sarvadharmān saṃpaśyamānaḥ prakṛtiśūnyān svalakṣaṇaśūnyān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_6-8u:2486_3: māyākārasadṛśam ātmānam adhiṣṭhāya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2487: ye sattvā matsariṇas teṣāṃ dānakathāṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2493: yadā te sattvā dāne pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2494: śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2495: tadā teṣāṃ sattvānām anuśāsanīṃ kathāṃ karoty āryāṃ nairyāṇikīṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2500: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2501: kiṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva aupalaṃbhiko 'saṃvidyamānāṃ sattvān dāne niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2506: prajñāyāṃ niyojayati. uttare cācāryā nairyāṇikīṃ kathāṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2511: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2512: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kaścid upalaṃbhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2513: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcit sattvam upalabhate 'nyatra saṃvṛttisaṃketena vyavaharati,
S06psp_6-8u:2514: tac chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ sthitvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2515: na hi śāriputra dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ sattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñaptiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2516: api tu khalūpāyakauśalyena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2517: tat te sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharma ātmānaṃ nopalabhante,
S06psp_6-8u:2520: evaṃ khalu śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_6-8u:2521: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2522: mahotpādo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na ca nāma bhagavan kasyacid dharmasyaikatvaṃ vā nānātvaṃ vā pṛthaktvaṃ vā upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2523: evaṃrūpaṃ ca saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate yena saṃnāhena saṃnahya na kāmadhātau dṛśyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2530: sattvāprajñaptyā sattvābandhaḥ sattvāmokṣaḥ sattvābandhāmokṣād asaṃkleśāvyavadānam asaṃkleśāvyavadānān na gatisaṃbhedaḥ prajñāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2533: yena vipākenātmanā sattvāḥ pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃdṛśyeran.
S06psp_6-8u:2534: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2535: evam etac chāriputraivam etad yathā vācaṃ bhāṣase,
S06psp_6-8u:2536: sacet pūrvaṃ sattvabhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvas tadā syād eṣa doṣaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2537: bodhisattvo 'pi tathāgato 'pi pūrvabhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvas tadā syād eṣa doṣaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2538: pañcagatiko vā saṃsāraḥ pūrvabhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvas tadā syād eṣa doṣaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2539: yasmāt tarhi śāriputrotpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiva eṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathatānanyatathatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2540: tatra nātmā na sattvo na jīvo na jantur (PSP_6-8:111)
S06psp_6-8u:2541: na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyakaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2543: kuto vedanā kutaḥ saṃjñā kutaḥ saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2545: kutaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanāni kutaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ kutaḥ pratītyasamutpannadharmāḥ kutaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni bhaviṣyanty,
S06psp_6-8u:2546: asatām eṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kutaḥ pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2547_0: yataḥ sattvāḥ parimocayitavyāḥ syur yasmāt tarhi śāriputra ime dharmā īdṛśāḥ svabhāvaśūnyās
S06psp_6-8u:2547_1: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāc chrutvānuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2548: na cātra kaścid dharmasvabhāvo yam upalabhate yo vā śakyo 'dhimoktuṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2550: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate yena saṃnāhena saṃnahya na pratyudāvartate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_6-8u:2555: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra māyākāranirmitaḥ puruṣo bahūni prāṇikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇy abhinirmimīte,
S06psp_6-8u:2557: saṃtarpyaivam udānam udānayed bahu me puṇyaṃ prasūtam iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:2558: śāriputrāpi nu tatra kaścid bhojito vā saṃtarpito vā bhavet.
S06psp_6-8u:2562_0: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
S06psp_6-8u:2562_1: caran caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2562_2: caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcendriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2562_3: āryāṣṭāṅge mārge sarvaśūnyatāsu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv aṣṭasu vimokṣamukheṣu navasv
S06psp_6-8u:2562_4: anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu
S06psp_6-8u:2562_5: tathāgatabaleṣu daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu (PSP_6-8:112)
S06psp_6-8u:2563: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāñ caran bodhimārgāṃ ca paripūrayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2564: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati na ca kañcit sattvam upalabhate yam upalabhya vinayet.
S06psp_6-8u:2566: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2567: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caratā sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2569: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2570_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_6-8u:2570_1: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2571: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran,
S06psp_6-8u:2572_2: caran sattvān paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06psp_6-8u:2574: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati?
S06psp_6-8u:2576: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti sattvebhyo dānaṃ datvā evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:2577: iha kulaputrā mā dānam āgrahaṇato grahīṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:2580: neha kulaputrā paramārthena dānaṃ na dānapatir na pratigrāhakaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2582: na ca prakṛtiśūnyā dharmān gṛhṇanty agrāhyā śūnyatā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvebhyo dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2583: na cātra dānam upalabhate na dānapatiṃ na pratigrāhakam anupalaṃbhapāramitaiṣā (PSP_6-8:113)
S06psp_6-8u:2585: sa dānadātṛpratigrāhakān anupalaṃbhamānaḥ sattvān srotaāpattiphale niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2589: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niyojayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2592: dānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye 'pi cānye dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2594: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃrūpaṃ dānaṃ datvā kṣatriyamahāśālakulānāṃ vā sahavratāyopapadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2599: sa tatra sattvāṃś caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2602: arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca. evaṃ tān sattvān dānena saṃgṛhyānupūrveṇa śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2603_0: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2603_1: caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcasv indriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptabodhyaṅgeṣv
S06psp_6-8u:2606: pratyekāṃ bodhim anuprāpayaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2608: tatra na kaścid dharmaḥ svabhāvena saṃvidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2613: evaṃ yūyam ātmanaś ca mahāntam arthaṃ kariṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:2614: parāṃś ca mahaty arthe niyojayiṣyatha. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2615: yathā caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya na jātu durgatiṃ patati,
S06psp_6-8u:2616: na jātu cakravartirājyan na kārayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2617: yādṛśaṃ hi vījaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:2618: tasya cakravartino yadā yācanakā āgacchanti tadā tasya cakravartino rājña evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:2619: yeṣāṃ mayā kṛtaśaś cakravartiphalaṃ parigṛhītaṃ nānyatra sattvānām (PSP_6-8:114)
S06psp_6-8u:2620: arthāya, tad etad yuṣmākam eva dattaṃ bhavatu,
S06psp_6-8u:2621: tasmd atra na mayānena cakravartirājyenārthaḥ prāg evānye nānyatra sattvānām arthāya saṃsāra upāttaḥ sa karuṇāyamāno mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2622: yāvan mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayitvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2623: te ca sattvā nopalabhyante ye pariniṣpannāḥ syur ity anyatra saṃjñānām asaṃketaṃ vyavahāra iti,
S06psp_6-8u:2624: sa ca vyavahāraḥ pratiśrutkopamo 'pravyāhāro veditavyaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2625: yathā carato na kiṃcit sattvānām antike 'parityakṣaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:2629: tāni punaḥ katamāny upakaraṇāni yad uta dānapāramitopakaraṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2634: imāni tāny upakaraṇāni yair upakaraṇair upagṛhītāḥ sattvāḥ saṃsārāt parimokṣyante.
S06psp_6-8u:2635: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasyā dānaṃ dadad evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣet,
S06psp_6-8u:2636_0: ahaṃ bho yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ śīlaṃ rakṣatāhaṃ yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annena vā
S06psp_6-8u:2636_1: pānena vā vastreṇa vā śayanāsanair vā yānair vā hiraṇyasuvarṇamanimuktāvajravaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāḍair vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2638: glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair vā yāvad anyatarair vā mānuṣyakaiḥ pariṣkāropakaraṇair,
S06psp_6-8u:2640: tad ahaṃ yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annādinā vā saptabhir vā ratnair,
S06psp_6-8u:2642: tad yūyaṃ saṃvaraśīle sthitvānupūrveṇa duṣkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatha tribhir yānaiḥ śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā (PSP_6-8:115)
S06psp_6-8u:2644: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān kṣāntisauratye niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2645: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvā ye kupyanti vā vyāpadyante vā teṣāṃ sattvānām evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06psp_6-8u:2646: kena yūyaṃ kāraṇena kulaputrā vyāpadyadhve doṣam utpādayatha?
S06psp_6-8u:2648: yasyārthena kupyatha vyāpadyatha tat mamāntikād gṛhṇītha,
S06psp_6-8u:2649_0: tena bhagavatām avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annena vā pānena vā vastreṇa vā śayanāsanair
S06psp_6-8u:2649_2: vā vividhair vā maṇiratnair vā yāvad anyatarānyatarair vā mānuṣyopakaraṇapariṣkārair
S06psp_6-8u:2649_3: yena yūyaṃ na kupyatha vyāpadyadhve. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
S06psp_6-8u:2650_0: naivātra kaścid bhāvo 'sti yaḥ bhāvo yena yuṣmākaṃ krodha upajāyata abhūtasaṃkalpa
S06psp_6-8u:2650_1: eṣa krodho naitasya kiṃcid vastv asti yasya yūyaṃ vastunaḥ kṛtaśo 'bhisajjatha kupyatha
S06psp_6-8u:2650_2: vyāpadyadhve 'bhiṣajya kupitvā vyāpadya daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharathānyamanyaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2651: tad yūyam asadbhūtasaṃkalpitakṣubhitā narakaṃ vā prapatiṣyatha tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā prapatiṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:2652: yā apy anyāḥ kāścid gatayas tāsu ca duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayiṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:2653: haṃbho puruṣā māvastukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśaḥ tat karma parigṛhṇīta yena parigṛhītena manuṣyapratilābho na bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2654: prāg eva buddhotpādo durlabhaḥ. sa khalu punar bho puruṣo durlabho buddhotpādo durlabho manuṣyalābho durlabhaḥ kṣaṇasaṃpad durlabhaḥ saṃsārāṃ mokṣaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2655: mā imaṃ kṣaṇaṃ virāgayiṣyatha mā vicikitsā bhaviṣyatha kṣaṇaprāptāḥ. tato bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmanā ca kṣāntyā saṃpādayāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2658: ye 'pi cānye kṣāntiṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2659: tatas tān sattvān kṣāntyāṃ niyojayitvā kṣāntyāṃ sthāpayitvānupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ (PSP_6-8:116)

S06psp_6-8u:2661: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran,

S06psp_6-8u:2667: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāñ caran tān sattvān etad avocat,

S06psp_6-8u:2673: yān bhāvayamānā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpsyanti sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpsyanti,

S06psp_6-8u:2675: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sattvān avavadatīha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:2676: kim idaṃ bhoḥ sattvā yūyaṃ dhyānan na samāpadyadhve?

S06psp_6-8u:2701_3: vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vāṣṭavimokṣā vā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo vā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā

S06psp_6-8u:2709: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā evaṃ sattvān paripācayati,

S06psp_6-8u:2714: yad bhavatā dīrgharātram eṣo 'rthaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśa upārjitas tad yuṣmākam evaiṣa santaka ity evaṃ gṛhītvā sattvebhyo dānaṃ dadadhvaṃ,

S06psp_6-8u:2721_1: sthitvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā

S06psp_6-8u:2723_1: sa tān sattvāṃs tathārūpeṇānugraheṇānugṛhṇāti yathārūpeṇānugrahenānugṛhītāḥ samān
S06psp_6-8u:2725: atha khalv āyuṣmataḥ subhūter etad abhavat:
S06psp_6-8u:2726: katamo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgo yatra sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena idṛśāḥ saṃnāhāḥ saṃnaddhavyāḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2727: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ subhūteś cetasaiva caitaḥ parivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:

S06psp_6-8u:2729: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2730_3: mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ. api tu khalu subhūte sarvadharmā api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,

S06psp_6-8u:2732_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. nāsti subhūte kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena
S06psp_6-8u:2732_2: mahāsattvenāśikṣitavyam aśikṣitvā yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śaknoti sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.

S06psp_6-8u:2736: na tu bhagavann aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2737: iyanta iti vā neyanta iti vā,

S06psp_6-8u:2739: vā saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā pṛthagjanadharmo vārhaddharmo vā pratyekabuddhadharmo vā buddhadharmo vā.
S06psp_6-8u:2740: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2741: evam etat subhūte evam etat sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā,

S06psp_6-8u:2743: yasmāt subhūte sarvadharmāḥ śūnyās tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,

S06psp_6-8u:2747: iyanta iti vā neyanta iti vā,

S06psp_6-8u:2748_2: subhūte ete sattvā evaṃ jānanti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti yadi jānīyur naimāṃ bodhisattvā
S06psp_6-8u:2749: yasmāt tarhi subhūte na jānanti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti,

S06psp_6-8u:2752: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhimārge caratā prathamam evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2753: nātra kaścid dharmo yaḥ svena bhāvenopalabhyate 'nyatrābhisaṃskāreṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:2754_0: tatra khalu dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvam upaparīkṣeyam aham upaparīkṣamāṇo na kvacid dharme
S06psp_6-8u:2754_1: 'bhiniveśeya yadi vā pāramitāsu yadi vā śūnyatāsu yadi vā saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2754_2: dharmeṣu yadi vā srotāapattiphale yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphale yadi vānāgāmiphale yadi

S06psp_6-8u:2755: tathā hi svabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā na hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyām abhiniviśate,
S06psp_6-8u:2757: śūnyatāyām abhinivekṣyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nabhiniviṣṭaḥ sarvadharmeṣu viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:2759: kutreme sattvāś caranty asaṃgrahe tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhavati,

S06psp_6-8u:2763_1: ca śīlena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ kṣāntisauratye 'vavadati

S06psp_6-8u:2764_2: avavadati taiś ca buddhadharmair mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na teṣu kiṃcit sāram asti. sa evam
S06psp_6-8u:2765: na kvacid dharme 'bhiniviśate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2767_0: ca sarvadharmās tathā hy eṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti ye nābhiniviśeta śūnyatāsvabhāvatām
S06psp_6-8u:2767_1: upādāya. tat subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mārge caran na kvacit pratiṣṭhate so
S06psp_6-8u:2767_2: 'pratiṣṭhānayogena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2768: śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2769: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2770: vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2771: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2772: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,

S06psp_6-8u:2774: tathā hi dhyānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yad api samāpadyate tad api śūnyaṃ yair ākāraiḥ samāpadyate te 'py ākārāḥ śūnyāḥ, evaṃ (PSP_6-8:122)

S06psp_6-8u:2781: srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2782: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2783: anāgāmiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,

S06psp_6-8u:2785: pratyekabuddhabhūmiñ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate.
S06psp_6-8u:2787: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na pratiṣṭhate?

S06psp_6-8u:2794: na ca mayārhattvaṃ na prāptavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ mayārhattvaṃ na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ,

S06psp_6-8u:2797: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ na pratiṣṭhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06psp_6-8u:2992: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2993: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2997: katame rāśau niyataḥ śrāvakarāśau vā pratyekabuddharāśau vā?
S06psp_6-8u:2999: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakarāśau vā niyataḥ pratyekabuddharāśau vā niyato 'pi tu buddharāśau subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3001: kiṃ punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ prathamacittotpādika (PSP_6-8:131)
S06psp_6-8u:3004: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vā niyataḥ caramabhaviko vā niyato 'pi tu prathamacittotpādiko niyataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3006: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyato 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate?
S06psp_6-8u:3008: na subhūte niyataḥ patito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3009: subhūte api tv aṣṭamako vā srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmi vā anāgāmi vārhan vā pratyekabuddho vā niyato 'pāyeṣūpapatsyante.
S06psp_6-8u:3013: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3014: tathā hi yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānaṃ samāpadyate prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3015: maitrīṃ karuṇāṃ muditām upekṣāṃ sattveṣu bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3018: dīrghāyuṣkeṣu vā deveṣūpapatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3019: yatrāpacāraḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyanteṣu vā janapadeṣūpatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3020: mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣūpapadyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3021: tatra copapatsyate yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdaḥ śruyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3022: akriyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣūpapatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3023: api tu khalu subhūte prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito 'dhyāśayena daśākuśalān karmapathān adhyāpadyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06psp_6-8u:3024: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3025: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ kuśaladharmasamanvāgato yad uta nāpratirūpeṣu sthāneṣūpapatsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3028: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3029: na punaḥ suhbūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃcintyatam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti, (PSP_6-8:132)
S06psp_6-8u:3030: yenātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaḥ tam ātmabhāvaṃ sattvānām arthāya pratigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:3031: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte 'sty etad arhataḥ pratyekabuddhasya vā upāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatas tiryagyonāv upapannaḥ syāt.
S06psp_6-8u:3035: tathāgatasya tad upāyakauśalyam asti yena tatropapannaḥ syād,
S06psp_6-8u:3036: ye ca tatra vadhāya parākramante tān anuttarāyāṃ kṣāntau samādāpayati vinaye pratiṣṭhāpayati teṣām eva cārthe ātmānaṃ parityajayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3037: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viheṭhanā bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3038: tad anena te suhbūte paryāyenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām arthāya mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayamāṇo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tiryagyonau vartate.
S06psp_6-8u:3039: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3040: katameṣu bhagavan kuśaladharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam evaṃrūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_6-8u:3041: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3042: sarvan tat subhūte kuśalaṃ karma yad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripūrayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3043_0: sarvakuśaladharmaparipūrir anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhis tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_6-8u:3043_1: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇena na kaścid dharmo yo na paripūrayitavyo
S06psp_6-8u:3044: tad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvakuśaladharmaparipūryai śikṣitavayaṃ yatra śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiṃ prahāsyati.
S06psp_6-8u:3045: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3046: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvac chukladharmasamanvāgata āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇāpāyeṣūpapadyate tiryagyonau vā?
S06psp_6-8u:3052: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tiryagyonigataṃ prāṇinam ātmānam abhinirmiṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:3067: bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāśraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvagataḥ sañcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:3068: yenātmabhāvena samanvāgatam anyān paripācayed yathā tathāgataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3070: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatas tan nirmitam abhinirmiṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:3075: bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgatas tat tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:3083: hastivigrahaṃ vāśvavigrahaṃ vā balīvardavigrahaṃ vānyān vā vividhān prāṇakajātān darśayaty api tu sa hastī vā bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3084: aśvo vā balīvardavigraho vānye vā vividhāḥ prāṇakajātā bhavanti.
S06psp_6-8u:3089: bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ sañcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti yenātmabhāveṇa samanvāgataḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:3092_0: mahopāyakuśalo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo nāma bhagavann āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa
S06psp_6-8u:3092_1: samanvāgato yena yena hy ātmabhāvena śakyate sattvānām arthaḥ kartun taṃ tam evātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:3094: katameṣu bhagavan śukleṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā idam evaṃrūpam upāyakauśalyaṃ karoti yena tair na lipyate?
S06psp_6-8u:3098: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarasyām adhamūrdhaṃ vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:3099: na tatra kvacit spṛśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3100: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvathaiva dharmān nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:3101: yad vā spṛśyeta yena vā spṛśyeta yo vā spṛśyet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3102: tathā hi sarva ete trayo dharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ tatra na śūnyatayā śūnyatā saṃspṛśyate naiva śūnyatāṃ kaścit saṃspṛśati,
S06psp_6-8u:3106: iyaṃ sānupalaṃbhaśūnyatā yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_6-8u:3108: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyām eva sthito nānyeṣu dharmeṣu?
S06psp_6-8u:3110: katamo vā subhūte dharmoe yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāntargataḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3114: na hi bhagavañ chūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharmāntargataḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3117: na punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3120: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3121: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharme śūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā abhijñāpāramitām abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:3122: yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadī vālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:3123: teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3124: tān paryupāste dharmañ ca śṛṇoti teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavansu kuśalamūlāny avaropayaty,
S06psp_6-8u:3125: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha ūrdhavaṃ vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:3126: teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3127: tān paryupāste dharmañ ca śṛṇoti teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayati.
S06psp_6-8u:3129: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3130: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tān sarvān śūnyān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3131: ye 'pi tatra buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ svabhāveṇa śūnyā,
S06psp_6-8u:3133: sā ca sarvā prajñaptiḥ svabhāvena śūnyā. yadi te lokadhātavo na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
S06psp_6-8u:3134: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
S06psp_6-8u:3135: te 'pi prajñaptisamudācārā na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
S06psp_6-8u:3136: tatprādeśikī śūnyatābhaviṣyad yasmāt prādeśikī śūnyatā nopalabhyate tasmāt sarvadharmā sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3137: atra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāpāramitām abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:3138: yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā divyañ cakṣur abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:3139: divyaṃ śrotram ṛddhividhijñānaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ cyutyupapattim abhinirharati. ābhir abhijñābhir bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3140: yad iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyābhijñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhir antargatā,
S06psp_6-8u:3141: abhijñāsu bodhir antargatā mārgayitavyāyāṃ mārgayamāṇo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇātmanas tān kuśalān dharmān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3143: na ca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣv abhinivekṣyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3144: tathā hi te sarvakuśalā dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3145: na ca śūnyatā kvacid abhinivekṣyate yad abhiniveśam āsvādayiṣyati niḥsvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:3146: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati yena cakṣuṣā sarvadharmā śūnyān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3147: tat punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān dharmān āgamya tat karmābhinirūpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3148: yayā karmābhiniruktyā sattvānān dharmaṃ deśayati na punaḥ sattvaprajñaptim uplabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3149: ity anupalaṃbhayogena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām abhijñā abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:3150: yāsv abhijñāsv abhijñā karuṇādharmāḥ kartavyās tān karoti.
S06psp_6-8u:3151_0: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3151_1: diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyāṃ diśy uttarasyāṃ diśy adha ūrdhvalokadhātuṣu yāvad
S06psp_6-8u:3152: sa tatrarddhyā gatvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:3153_0: yadi vā dānena yadi vā śīlena yadi vā kṣāntyā yadi vā vīryeṇa yadi vā dhyānena yadi
S06psp_6-8u:3153_1: vā prajñayā yadi vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmair yadi vāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhair
S06psp_6-8u:3153_2: yadi vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmair yadi vā bodhisattvadharmair yadi vā buddhadharmais
S06psp_6-8u:3154: tatra ye sattvā matsariṇas teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3155: dadata dānan duṣkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dāridryan na ca dāridryeṇa śakyam ātmano 'rthaḥ kartuṃ prāg eva parasya,
S06psp_6-8u:3156: tasmād yūyam ātmanā ca sukhino bhaviṣyatha parāṃś ca sukhayiṣyatha mā dāridryeṇānyeṣāṃ māṃsāni khādayanto na mokṣyatha tribhir apāyaiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3157: ye duḥśīlā sattvās teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3158: duḥkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dauḥśīlyaṃ na ca dauḥśīlyena śakyam ātmano 'thaḥ kartuṃ prāg eva parasya,
S06psp_6-8u:3159: dauḥśīlyasya ca yo vipāko narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tatra yūyaṃ triṣv apāyeṣu prapatitā ātmānam eva na śakyathoddhartuṃ prāg eva paraṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3160: tad bhavadbhir ekadauśīlyacittasyāpy avakāśo na dātavyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3162: ye sattvāḥ pratihatacittāḥ parasya caṃ krudhyanti vyāpadyante doṣam utpādayatām eṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3163: mā bhavanto 'nyonyaṃ kṣubhyathānyonyaṃ vyāpadyadhve mā doṣam utpādayata kṣubdhacittasya hi na kaścit kuśalo dharma āmukhī bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3164: tad bhavanto 'nyonyam evaṃ kṣubdhacittā vyāpannacittāḥ sthānam etad vidyate yan narakaṃ vā prapatathā tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:3165: tad bhavadbhir ekacittenāpi na kṣobdhavyaṃ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittānām avakāśo dātavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3166: ye kuśīdāḥ sattvās tān vīrye niyojayati teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3167_0: mā bhavantaḥ kauśīdyam āpadyadhvaṃ na kusīdānāṃ hīnavīryāṇāṃ kācic chubhā pravṛttiḥ
S06psp_6-8u:3167_1: sthānam etad vidyate yat kuśīdānān narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tad bhavadbhir
S06psp_6-8u:3167_2: ekasyāpi kuśīdacittasyāvakāśo na dātavyaḥ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittānām.
S06psp_6-8u:3168: ye vikṣiptacittāḥ sattvās tān sarvān dhyāne niyojayati, teṣāṃ evaṃ (PSP_6-8:137)
S06psp_6-8u:3170: mā bhavanto muṣitasmṛtayo vikṣiptacittāś ca bhavatan muṣitasmṛtīnām vikṣiptacittānāṃ vā kuśalā dharmā bhavanti sthānam etad vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3171: yaṃ muṣitasmṛtīnāṃ vikṣiptacittānāṃ vā narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tad bhavadbhir ekasyāpi vikṣiptacittasyāvakāśo na dātavyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3173: ye duṣprajñāḥ sattvās tān sarvān prajñāyāṃ niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3175: mā yūyaṃ dauṣprajñacittam utpādayedhvaṃ nāprajñānāṃ sugatigamanaṃ bhavati sthānam etad vidyate yad duṣprajñānāṃ narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā,
S06psp_6-8u:3176: tad bhavadbhir ekacittotpādo 'pi prajñāvirahito notpādayitavyaṃ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśo dātavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3177: ye rāgacaritāḥ sattvās tān śubhabhāvanāyāṃ niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3178: ye mārge 'sthitāḥ sattvās tān mārge niyojayati yadi vā śrāvakamārge niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3179: yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārge niyojayati teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3180: yatra bhavanto 'bhiniviṣṭāt te dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3181: na svabhāvena śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu śakyam abhiniveṣṭum anabhiniviṣṭā ca śūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:3182: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāsu sthitvā sattvānām upakāraṃ karoti.
S06psp_6-8u:3183: nāsti sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ śakto 'bhijñāsv asthitvā sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kartum,
S06psp_6-8u:3184: utpathaprasthitān vā sattvān mārge 'vatārayituṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tadyathā subhūte 'pakṣaḥ pakṣī na śaknoty ākāśe kramitum,
S06psp_6-8u:3185: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nāgamyābhijñā na śaknoti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayituṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3186: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3187_0: sa imābhir abhijñābhir abhinirhṛtābhir yad ākāṅkṣati sattvānām arthaṃ kartuṃ tat
S06psp_6-8u:3187_1: kariṣyati divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn
S06psp_6-8u:3187_2: drakṣyati tatra sattvā utpannās tān drakṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3188: dṛṣṭvā ca tān satttvān ṛddhyā gatvā cetasaiva cittaṃ prajñāsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3189: cittaṃ jñātvā tathāiva teṣāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3191: yadi vā śīlakathāṃ yadi vā kṣāntikathāṃ yadi vā vīryakathāṃ yadi vā dhyānakathāṃ yadi vā prajñākathāṃ yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3192: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇobhau śabdau śroṣyati mānuṣyañ cāmānuṣyañ ca,
S06psp_6-8u:3193: tatra ye gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3194: tan divyena śrotradhātunā śrutvā tathāivodgrahīṣyati tathāivodgṛhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3195: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3196: tasya cetaḥparyāyajñānaṃ suviśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati sa tena cetaḥparyāyajñānena suviśuddhena sattvānāṃ cittaṃ prajñāsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3197: cittaṃ jñātvā teṣāṃ tathāiva dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3198: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3200: apy ātmanaḥ pareṣām api sa tena pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānena evaṃ jñāsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3201_0: evaṃnāmāni te 'bhūvan pūrvakās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās
S06psp_6-8u:3201_1: tatra ye sattvāḥ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyadhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti tebhyas tathāiva dharmaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3201_2: deśayiṣyati dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3201_3: vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3202_0: so 'nekavividhayā ṛddhyā samanvāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gatvā buddhān
S06psp_6-8u:3202_1: bhagavataḥ paryupāste teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayiṣyati kuśalamūlāny
S06psp_6-8u:3202_2: avaropya tad eva punar buddhakṣetram āgamiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3204: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3207: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan (PSP_6-8:139)
S06psp_6-8u:3209: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3210: sa imābhir abhijñābhir nihṛtābhir yaṃ yam evākāṅkṣiṣyaty ātmabhāvaṃ pratigrahītuṃ taṃ tam evātmabhāvaṃ pratigrahīṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3211: na ca tena sukhena vā duḥkhena vā sumanā vā durmanā vā bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3212: naivāsyānunaya pratighau bhaviṣyathaḥ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte buddhanirmitaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvakṛtyāni karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:3213: na ca tena sukhena vā duṣkhena vā lipyate.
S06psp_6-8u:3214: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratābhijñābhir vikrīḍitavyam evaṃ vikrīḍaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyati sattvān paripācayiṣyati.
S06psp_6-8u:3215: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu paripāciteṣu sattveṣu śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3216: nāsti hi subhūte aṅgahānir asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksamodhau.
S06psp_6-8u:3218: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3219: katamāni bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhyaṅgāni yāni bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_6-8u:3220: evam ukte bhāgavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3221: sarve kuśalā dharmāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhyaṅgāni.
S06psp_6-8u:3223: te punar bhagavan katame kuśalā dharmā yaiḥ kuśalaiḥ dharmair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_6-8u:3224: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3225: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte dānapāramitā kuśalo dharmas tatra ca yāvikalpanā yad dānaṃ na jānātīdaṃ dānaṃ yasyārthe dātavyaṃ yena dātavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3226: te cāsya trayo vikalpā na saṃvidyante svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_6-8u:3227: yayā pāramitayātmanā ca tarati sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye (PSP_6-8:140)
S06psp_6-8u:3228_0: mārgaḥ, yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tīrṇās taranti
S06psp_6-8u:3228_1: tariṣyanti ca. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_6-8u:3229: yat prajñāṃ na jānātīyaṃ prajñā yasyārthe bhāvayitavyā yena bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_6-8u:3230: te cāsya trayo vikalpā na saṃvidyante svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya yayā prajñāpāramitayā,
S06psp_6-8u:3231: ātmanā ca tarati sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye mārgaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3232: yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvās tīrṇās taranti tariṣyanti ca.
S06psp_6-8u:3233: evaṃ catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni,
S06psp_6-8u:3235_1: pañcābhijñā daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā
S06psp_6-8u:3235_2: buddhadharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalā dharmās teṣu cāvikalpanā yad buddhadharmān
S06psp_6-8u:3235_3: na jānātīme buddhadharmā yasyārthe bhāvayitavyā yena bhāvayitavyās te cāsya trayo
S06psp_6-8u:3235_4: vikalpā na saṃvidyante svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya yair buddhadharmair ātmanā ca tarati
S06psp_6-8u:3235_5: sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsatttvasyānuttarāyai
S06psp_6-8u:3236: yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tīrṇās taranti ca tariṣyanti ca,
S06psp_6-8u:3237: yāvantaḥ subhūte kecid bodhaye mārgās tān kuśalān dharmān bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripūrya sarvākārajñatānuprāptavyā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:3239: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3242: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3243: yat punar āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_6-8u:3244: yadīme dharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāḥ punaḥ katame?
S06psp_6-8u:3246: ebhir dharmaiḥ sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbudhyate tasya sarvākārajñatāprāptasya sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiḥ prahīyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3247_0: tāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhisaṃbudhyate tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmā
S06psp_6-8u:3247_1: ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ viśeso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_6-8u:3247_2: ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya. tad yathāpi nāma subhūte anya eva pratipannako 'nyaḥ phalasthaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3248: na ca tāv ubhāv api nāgrapudgalau,
S06psp_6-8u:3249: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattva ānantaryamārgapratipannakas tathāgataḥ punar arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmeṣv anāvaraṇajñānaprāptaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3250: ayaṃ subhūte viśeṣo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya.
S06psp_6-8u:3251: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3252: yadi bhagavann ime dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyās tat kathaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vopalabhyate?
S06psp_6-8u:3253_0: ayaṃ nairayiko 'yaṃ tairyagyoniko 'yaṃ yāmalaukiko 'yaṃ devo 'yaṃ manuṣyo 'yaṃ gotrabhūmir
S06psp_6-8u:3253_1: ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho
S06psp_6-8u:3254: yathaiva bhagavann ime pudgalā nopalabhyante tathāiva bhagavan karma nopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3255: yathaiva bhagavan karma nopalabhyate tathāiva vipāko nopalabhyate.
S06psp_6-8u:3256: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṇtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3258: yathā vadasi svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na karma na vipāka upalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3259: ye svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān sattvā nābhijānanti te karmābhisaṃkurvanti duścaritaṃ vā sucaritaṃ vā sāsravaṃ vānāsravaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:3260: te duścaritena karmaṇā triṣv apāyeṣu prapatanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3261: narakeṣu vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā,
S06psp_6-8u:3286_0: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carann acchidracārīmān bodhisattvadharmān utpādayati
S06psp_6-8u:3286_1: yānutpādya bodhyaṅgaparivārasahagataṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'nutttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3288: yenārthena kṛtena na punar vipraṇasyanti yena vipraṇāśeṇa pañcagatike saṃsāre prapateyuḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3289: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3290: kiṃ punar bhagavatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāra upalabdhaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3293: kiṃ punar bhagavatā kṛṣṇāṃ vā śuklaṃ vā karmopalabdham?
S06psp_6-8u:3296: yadi nopalabdhaṃ kuto narakas tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ prajñapto devamanuṣyāḥ prajñaptāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3300: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti?
S06psp_6-8u:3304: yadi subhūte sattvā evaṃ jānīyuḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3305: na bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhetānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthitvā na sattvān mocayet,
S06psp_6-8u:3308: sattvā na jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmāṃs te 'jñatā na parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt,
S06psp_6-8u:3309: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike śrutvā svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhet,
S06psp_6-8u:3310_0: ime dharmās tathā na saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭhās te sattvā asato
S06psp_6-8u:3310_1: 'saṃvidyamānāṃ dharmān svayam eva vikalpayanty upalabhante vāsattve sattvasaṃjñino
S06psp_6-8u:3313: asaṃvidyamānānāṃ viparyāse 'viparyastacittāḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca karmābhisaṃskurvanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3315: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpārmitāyāṃ caran sarvān antargatān kuśalān dharmān kṛtvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ carati,
S06psp_6-8u:3316: yayā caryayā carann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_6-8u:3318_0: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya duṣkhañ ca duṣkhasamudayaṃ ca duṣkhanirodhañ
S06psp_6-8u:3318_1: ca duḥkhanirodhagāminīñ ca pratipadam ākhyāti deśayati prakāśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajati
S06psp_6-8u:3319: eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣu sarvāntargatāḥ kuśalā dharmā ye kecid bodhipakṣyā dharmā yair bodhipākṣikair dharmais trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3322: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ prādurbhāvāt sattvāḥ parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt.
S06psp_6-8u:3323: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3332: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3333: na subhūte duṣkhajñānena parinirvānti na duṣkhena,
S06psp_6-8u:3337: yā punaḥ subhūte caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā tat parinirvāṇam uktaṃ mayā,
S06psp_6-8u:3338: na punar duḥkhena parinirvānti na duṣkhajñānena,
S06psp_6-8u:3342: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3345: yatra subhūte na duṣkhan na duṣkhajñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3349_0: api tu khalu subhūte yā eṣāṃ caturṇām āryasatyāṇāṃ tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā dharmatā
S06psp_6-8u:3349_1: dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā yasyotpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād
S06psp_6-8u:3349_2: vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmādhātur yāsaṃpramoṣadharmatāyai
S06psp_6-8u:3350: tāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhaye carati,
S06psp_6-8u:3353: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3354: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhaye carati,
S06psp_6-8u:3357: yathā pratipadyamāno na śrāvakabhūmiṃ patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ patati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati.
S06psp_6-8u:3358: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3360: tathā ca paśyati yathā na kañcid dharmam upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:3363: vā asatyaparyāpannāṃ vā taṃ sarve śunyā iti paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3364: sa evaṃ paśyann avakrāntaniyāmo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gotrabhūmau sthito bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3365: tasya gotrabhūmau sthitasya na mūrdhavinipāto bhavati yena mūrdhavinipātena śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patet,
S06psp_6-8u:3366: sa iha gotrabhūmau sthitvā catvāri dhyānāny utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3368: sa iha śamathabhūmau sthitvā sarvadharmān pravicinoti,
S06psp_6-8u:3370: sa duḥkhañ ca parijānāti na ca duṣkhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3371: samudayañ ca prajahāti na ca samudayārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3372: nirodhañ ca sākṣātkaroti na ca nirodhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3373: mārgañ ca bhāvayati na ca mārgārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3374: anyatra bodhinimnena cittena bodhipraveśena bodhiprāgbhāreṇa cittena sarvadharmān yathāvat paśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:3383: yo 'nayaivaṃrūpayā vipaśyanayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3384: na ca kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3392: sā na buddhena kṛtā na pratyekabuddhena nārhatā nāpi tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ya iha samādhau caranty anyatra sattvā na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3393: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_6-8u:3395: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3396: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tadā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ (PSP_6-8:146)
S06psp_6-8u:3398: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
