S06psp_6-8u:3584: advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti tad evaṃ rūpaprabhedaprajñaptau satyām,
S06psp_6-8u:3585: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmaprabhedaprajñaptau satyāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3586_0: kiṃ saṃdhāya nirdiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā
S06psp_6-8u:3586_1: gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā
S06psp_6-8u:3589: maitreya yā parikalpite rūpe 'dravyatā rūpaṃ vā tan na veti.
S06psp_6-8u:3593: ] yā punas tatra nāmasaṃjñāprajñaptivyavahāramātratā rūpam ity api nu tad rūpam?
S06psp_6-8u:3598: yat parikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ tan na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ yat punā rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3599: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3600: maitreya yā vikalpitasya rūpasya sadravyatā api nu tad rūpaṃ yad upādāya nāmasaṃjñāprajñaptivyavahāro bhavati rūpam iti.
S06psp_6-8u:3605: maitreya yā nimittena parikalpitena rūpeṇa parikalpitasya rūpasya tat svabhāvatāsallakṣaṇatāpi nu tad (PSP_6-8:154) rūpam.
S06psp_6-8u:3609: ] tad anena te maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3610: yad vikalpitaṃ rūpam api na rūpan nārūpaṃ yat punar na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayam,
S06psp_6-8u:3611: idañ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3612: maitreya yā dharmatā rūpasya nairātmyaprabhāvitatāpi nu tad rūpam.
S06psp_6-8u:3616: ] yā punas tathāivaṃ dharmatā rūpasya rūpadharmatā api nu tad rūpam?
S06psp_6-8u:3621_0: yad dharmatā rūpam api na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ yan na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayam idaṃ ca
S06psp_6-8u:3621_1: saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayādvayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu
S06psp_6-8u:3623_0: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpa evam advayalakṣaṇakuśalasya
S06psp_6-8u:3623_1: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne yāvad buddhadharmeṣu evam advayalakṣaṇakuśalasyāntadvayaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3629: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ maitreya carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntadvayaṃ varjayitvā madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ pratipannasya,
S06psp_6-8u:3630: rūpasya yan na parijñānaṃ nāparijñānam iyam evāsya parijñā,
S06psp_6-8u:3631: yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na parijñānaṃ nāparijñānam iyam evāsya parijñā,
S06psp_6-8u:3633: na prahāṇaṃ nāprahāṇam idam evāsya prahāṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3634: yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na prahāṇaṃ nāprahāṇam idam evāsya prahāṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3635: yā rūpasya na sākṣātkriyā nāsākṣātkriyā iyam evāsya sākṣātkriyā,
S06psp_6-8u:3636_0: yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na sākṣātkriyā
S06psp_6-8u:3636_1: nāsākṣātkriyā iyam evāsya sākṣātkriyā rūpaprahāṇāya na mārgasya bhāvanā nābhāvanā
S06psp_6-8u:3637: evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya na mārgasya bhāvanā nābhāvanā iyam evāsya bhāvanā.
S06psp_6-8u:3639: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃś carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ parijñāprahāṇasākṣātkriyābhāvanāsamanvāgatasya katamaṃ nirvāṇam?
S06psp_6-8u:3641: gambhīraṃ maitreya paramagambhīraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirvāṇam.
S06psp_6-8u:3643: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām evaṃ gambhīraṃ paramagambhīraṃ nirvāṇam?
S06psp_6-8u:3645: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ maitreya nirvāṇaṃ yan nirvāṇaṃ nānirvāṇaṃ tena gambhīraṃ paramagambhīram ity ucyate.
S06psp_6-8u:3647: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ na nirvāṇaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3652: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ parārtham ārabhya saṃsāraṃ na parityajati saṃsārāt parityāgāt katham anena nirvāṇaṃ na parityaktaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3653: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmārtham ārabhya nirvāṇaṃ na parityajati nirvāṇāparityāgāt katham anena saṃsāro na parityakto bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3655: iha maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran saṃsāram api saṃsārato na vikalpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3658: yad uta saṃsāraś ca nirvāṇaś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3659: tathā hi sa yathā saṃsāraṃ saṃsārato 'vikalpayan saṃsārān nodvijati,
S06psp_6-8u:3660: tathāiva nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇato 'vikalpayan nirvāṇato nodvijaty evam avikalpadhātupratiṣṭhitasyānayā yuktyā na saṃsāraparityāgo na nirvāṇaparityāgo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3662: na nu bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāvikalpadhātupratiṣṭhitena saṃsāro yathaiva na tyaktas tathā nādattaḥ katham atyakto bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3663: nirvāṇaṃ yathā na tyaktaṃ tathā nādattaṃ kathaṃ atyaktaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3665: nāhaṃ maitreya saṃsārasyaivam ādānaṃ vānādānaṃ vā vadāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:3666_0: nirvāṇasyaivam ādānaṃ vānādānaṃ vā vadāmy api tu maitreya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato
S06psp_6-8u:3666_3: upādāyāhaṃ parinirvṛtāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃsārasyāparityāgaṃ vadāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:3671_0: yac ca maitreya rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ yāvad
S06psp_6-8u:3671_1: ye ca buddhadharmā yā ca rūpasya śūnyatā yā ca vedanāyā yā ca saṃjñāyā yā ca saṃskārāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3671_2: yā ca vijñānasya yā ca yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:3672: teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ tasyāś ca śūnyatāyā yā bhāvābhāvādvayatā yā cāprapañcanā idaṃ maitreya avikalpanāyāḥ samastalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:3674: kiṃ nu bhagavan sarveṣāṃ śrāvakāṇām ekāṃśenaikāṃśikī nirvāṇapratiṣṭhā bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3678: hi nānādhātuko 'yaṃ maitreya loko 'nekadhātukas tasmiṃś ca nānādhātukeṣu bhūtāḥ sattvagotraprabhṛtaya upalabhyante,
S06psp_6-8u:3680: yādita eva praṇītaṃ viśesaṃ prārthayate praṇītam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:3681: asti sā gotrajātir yādita evaṃ hīṇaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate hīnam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati tenaiva ca saṃtuṣṭo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3682: asti sā gotrajātir yādita eva hīnaviśeṣaṃ prārthayate hīnam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati na ca tāvatā saṃtuṣṭo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3683: tata uttari praṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate praṇītam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati.
S06psp_6-8u:3686: so 'rhattvaṃ prāpyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhiprārthayamāno 'nupapadyamānaś ca kathaṃ prāpnoty upapattiś cāsya bhagavatā pratipattau ca na vyākṛtā?
S06psp_6-8u:3689: api tv acintyān nirvāṇapāragāminīm arhato 'py upapattiṃ prajñāpayāmi.
S06psp_6-8u:3691: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad udārāśayā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā māhātmyādhyāśayāś ca,
S06psp_6-8u:3692: yatredānīm ādita eva praṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3697: yan maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakratvalokapālatvacakravartitvasarvākāralokasaṃpattibhir anarthino 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3698_0: tāsu ca niḥsaṃgatā niravagrahatā ceyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām udārāśayatā.
S06psp_6-8u:3698_1: tat punar bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tad asaktisukham anavagrahasukhaṃ nirvṛttisukhaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3698_2: ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇam icchanto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3699: yad uta saṃsārāparityāgatayā iyam eṣāṃ māhātmyādhyāśayatā draṣṭavyā.
S06psp_6-8u:3700: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3703: āścaryān adbhutān bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvadharmān anuprāptukāmenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:3705: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3706_0: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās te na buddhaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair
S06psp_6-8u:3706_1: nārhadbhir nānāgāmibhir na sakṛdāgāmibhir na srotaāpannair nāpi tair bodhisattvair
S06psp_6-8u:3706_2: mahāsattvaiḥ kṛtās tat kuta eṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā vyavasthānaṃ vā prajñāyate?
S06psp_6-8u:3707: ime nairayikā ime tairyagyonikā ime yāmalaukikā ime devā ime mānuṣyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3708: anena karmaṇā nairayikā anena karmaṇā tiryagyonikā anena karmaṇā yāmalaukikā anena karmaṇā manuṣyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3714: anena karmaṇā aspṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3715: anena karmaṇā ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattayo vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattaya ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattayo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3716: anena karmaṇā srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho,
S06psp_6-8u:3718: 'nena karmaṇā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'bhāvasya hi bhagavan na kācit kriyā yayā narakaṃ vā gacchacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3719: tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā kāmadhātuṃ vā rūpadhātuṃ vā ārūpyadhātuṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3720: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā prāpsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3724: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3725: evam etat subhūte evam etad yathā vadasi,
S06psp_6-8u:3726: abhāvasya hi subhūte na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3727: bālapṛthagjanā hi subhūte yāvad āryadharmeṣv akovidās te abhāvasvabhāvān dharmān na jānanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3728: te viparyāsasamutthitair vikalpair vividhāni karmāṇy upasthāpayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3730: yadi vā nairayikā yadi vā tairyagyonikā yadi vā yāmalaukikā yadi vā manuṣyeṣu yadi vā kāmadhātuṣu deveṣu yadi vā rūpadhātukeṣu (PSP_6-8:159)
S06psp_6-8u:3731: deveṣu yadi vā ārūpyadhātukeṣu deveṣu yāvad abhāvasya na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3732: yaḥ punar abhāvo 'bhāva eva saḥ. yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha:
S06psp_6-8u:3733: yaḥ srotāapannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mārgajñatāyāṃ carati tathāgato vā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3734: subhūte nābhāvo mārgo nābhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalan nābhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalan nābhāvo 'nāgāmiphalan nābhāvo 'rhattvan nābhāvaḥ pratyekabodhir nābhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_6-8u:3736: abhāvo bhagavan mārgo 'bhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalam abhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam abhāvo nāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'rhattvam abhāvaḥ pratyekabodhir abhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_6-8u:3738: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte 'bhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_6-8u:3742_0: iti hi subhūte yaś cābhāvo yaś ca mārgaḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā
S06psp_6-8u:3742_1: arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇās tat subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:3742_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena ye sattvāś caturbhir viparyāsair abhiniviṣṭāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:3742_3: pañcasu skandheṣv anitye nityasaṃjñino 'nātmany ātmasaṃjñino duḥkhe sukhasaṃjñino
S06psp_6-8u:3742_4: 'śubhe śubhasaṃjñmo bhāveṣv abhiniviṣṭās tāṃs tān bhāvebhyo vivecayati.
S06psp_6-8u:3744: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3745_0: asti bhagavan avastu bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ tathatāvitathatā yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanā
S06psp_6-8u:3745_1: idaṃ vastv ity abhiniveśenābhiniviśya bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ tathatāvitathatā karmābhisaṃkurvanti
S06psp_6-8u:3745_2: yena karmaṇā pañcagatikān saṃsārān na parimucyante.
S06psp_6-8u:3747: nāsti subhūte 'ntaśo vālāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātram api vastu yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanāḥ karmābhisaṃskurvanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3753: tena hi subhūte upamān te kariṣyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:3754: asyaivārthasya bhūyasyā mātrayā prasiddhaye yathā paṇḍitā jānīyus,
S06psp_6-8u:3756: subhūte kiñcit svapne darśinas tad vastv asti yatra sthitvā svapnadarśī pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ paricaret.
S06psp_6-8u:3758: svapna eva tāvad bhagavan nāsti kutaḥ punas tatra sthitvā svapnadarśī pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ paricariṣyati.
S06psp_6-8u:3761: subhūte 'sti sa kaścid dharmo laukiko vā lokottaro vā sāsravo vānāsravo vā saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā yo na svapnopamaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3763: nāsti bhagavan sa kaścid dharmaḥ saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā sāsravo vānāsravo vā laukiko vā lokottaro vā yo na svapnopamaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3766: subhūte kaścit svapne pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro vidyate?
S06psp_6-8u:3772: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta vā na vyavadāyeta vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3774: no hīdaṃ bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan svapno 'prajñaptiko 'prajñapanīyaḥ sarvapadavyañjanaiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3777: subhūte yadādarśamaṇḍale pratibimbo dṛśyate kiñcit tasya vastv asti yat karmābhisaṃskuryād yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet?
S06psp_6-8u:3779: no hīdaṃ bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan pratibimbo 'nyatra bālapṛthagjanānām ullāpanāt tat kutas tasya karma bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3780: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet.
S06psp_6-8u:3783: subhūte kācit tasya mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3785: no bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan pratibimbakas (PSP_6-8:161)
S06psp_6-8u:3786: tat kutas tasya mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3789_1: niścarati kin tasyāḥ pratiśrutkāyāḥ karmāsti yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet
S06psp_6-8u:3790: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet?
S06psp_6-8u:3792: no bhagavan na vastukā sā pratiśrutkā kutas tasyāḥ karma bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3793: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3794: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet.
S06psp_6-8u:3797: subhūte kin tasyāḥ pratiśrutkā yā mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāpayeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3799: no bhagavann atyantatayā sā bhagavan pratiśrutkā nāsti kutas tasyā mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyet,
S06psp_6-8u:3803_0: subhūte yā sā marīcyām anudake udakasaṃjñā anadīṣu vā nadīsaṃjñā anagareṣu nagarasaṃjñā
S06psp_6-8u:3803_1: anudyāneṣv udyānasaṃjñā kiṃ tasyā marīcisaṃjñāyāḥ karmāsti yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya
S06psp_6-8u:3803_2: narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3804: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet?
S06psp_6-8u:3806_0: no bhagavann atyantatayā bhagavaṃs tasyāṃ marīcyām udakaṃ nāsti naiva nadī naiva
S06psp_6-8u:3806_1: nagaran naivodyānam anyatra saṃjñāviparyāsaś cakṣurmohanatāyās tat kuto 'syāḥ karma
S06psp_6-8u:3806_2: bhaviṣyati yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3807: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet.
S06psp_6-8u:3810: subhūte kiṃ tasyāṃ viparyastāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na (PSP_6-8:162)
S06psp_6-8u:3813: no bhagavan na hi viparyastāyāṃ bhagavan saṃjñāyām asti mārgabhāvanā yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3817_0: yadi vā hastikāyo yadi vāśvakāyo yadi vā balīvardakāyo yadi vā pattikāyo yadi vā
S06psp_6-8u:3817_1: janapadakāyo yadi vā strīrūpaṃ yadi vā puruṣarūpam api nu tasyā māyāyāḥ karmāsti
S06psp_6-8u:3817_2: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3818: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣūpapadyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3820_0: no bhagavan na hi māyāyā bhagavan vastv asty antaśo vālāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātram api
S06psp_6-8u:3820_1: yatra sthitvā karmābhisaṃkuryād yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3820_2: vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv
S06psp_6-8u:3823: subhūte kācit tasya mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3825: no bhagavan na vastu kasya bhagavan dharmasya kuto mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3828: subhūte yat punas tathāgatanirmito 'bhinirmiṇoty anyan nirmitaṃ kiṃ tasya nirmitasya karmāsti yena karmaṇā narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3829: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣūpapadyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3831: no bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan nirmitaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3834: subhūte kācit tasya nirmitasya mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vayavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3840: subhūte kaścid atra saṃkliśyeta vā vyavadāyeta vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3842: na kaścid bhagavan saṃkliśyeta vā vyavadāyeta vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3844: yathaiva subhūte na saṃkliśyeta vā na vyavadāyeta vā tathāiva nāsti saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3845: ahaṃkāramamakāre hi subhūte sthitāḥ sattvāḥ saṃkliśyante vā vyavadāyante vā,
S06psp_6-8u:3846: yathaiva bhūtadarśī na saṃkliśyate vā na vyavadāyate vā tathāiva subhūte nāsti saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3848: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3849: bhūtaṃ veti bhagavan na saṃkliśyate na vayavadāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3850: abhūtaṃ veti bhagavan na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3852: abhāvasvabhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3853: bhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam,
S06psp_6-8u:3854: abhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3855: bhāvābhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ tatra yad etad bhagavatā vyavadānan nirdiṣṭan tat katham idaṃ bhagavan bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3857: yā eṣā subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā tan mayoktaṃ vyavadānam.
S06psp_6-8u:3861: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:3862: yā utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā dharmadhātum idam ucyate vyavadānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3863: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa vyavahriyate na punaḥ paramārthenānirabhilapyo hi so 'pravyāhāraḥ sarvākāraghoṣavākyathātītaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3865: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3866_0: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ pratibimbopamā
S06psp_6-8u:3866_1: marīcyupamā māyopamā gandharvanagaropamā nirmitakopamās tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:3867_0: sarvadharmaiḥ pratiśrutkopamaiḥ pratibhāsopamaiḥ pratibimbopamair marīcyupamair māyopamair
S06psp_6-8u:3867_1: gandharvanagaropamair nirmitakopamair dharmair avastukeṣv adravyeṣv anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3901: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni paripūrayaty aśītyanuvyañjanāni paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3902: yāvat trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātāv ābhāsakarīm ābhāṃ pariniṣpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3904: tatraikena svareṇa daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu yathādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ cetasaiva cittam ājñāya dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_6-8u:3907: subhūte naite dharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ pratibimbopamā marīcyupamā māyopamā gandharvanagaropamā nirmitakopamāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3910: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ pratibimbopamā marīcyupamā māyopamā gandharvanagaropamā nirmitakopamāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3912: sarvadharmeṣu yāvan nirmitakopameṣu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_6-8u:3913_0: na ca bhagavan svapno bhūto na pratiśrutkā bhūtā na pratibhāso bhūto na pratibimbaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3913_1: bhūtaṃ na marīcir bhūtā na māyā bhūtā na gandharvanagaraṃ bhūtaṃ na nirmitako bhūto
S06psp_6-8u:3913_2: na ca bhagavan śakyam abhūtena dānapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3913_3: carituṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carituṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3917: śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3919: sarve te subhūte dharmā anabhisaṃskṛtā anabhinirvṛttā na śakyā anabhisaṃskṛtair dharmaiḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
S06psp_6-8u:3920: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarva ete dharmā mārgasyāvāhanāya saṃvartante,
S06psp_6-8u:3922: ya eteṣāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo 'prādurbhāvo 'lakṣaṇam api tat,
S06psp_6-8u:3923: ato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yān kuśalān dharmān nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:3924: yadi vā dānapāramitāṃ yadi vā śīlapāramitāṃ yadi vā kṣāntipāramitāṃ yadi vā vīryapāramitāṃ yadi vā dhyānapāramitāṃ yadi vā prajñāpāramitāṃ yadi vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān,
S06psp_6-8u:3925_0: yadi vā adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yadi vā bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yadi vādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3927: na cemān dharmān aparipūrya dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3928_4: sarvākāravaropetaṃ jñānam aparipūrya sattvān aparipācya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3928_5: caran sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3929_0: yān yān eva kuśalān dharmān ārabhate tāṃs tān kuśalān dharmān svapnopamān pratiśrutkopamān
S06psp_6-8u:3929_1: pratibhāsopamān pratibimbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān gandharvanagaropamān nirmitakopamān jānāti.
S06psp_6-8u:3930_0: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3930_1: caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3934_0: pañcasv abhijñāsu caran sarvasamādhiṣu caran sarvadhāraṇīmukhesu caran daśabodhisattvabhūmiṣu
S06psp_6-8u:3934_1: caran daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caran caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu caran catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu
S06psp_6-8u:3935: pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān gandharvanagaropamān nirmitakopamān jānāti,
S06psp_6-8u:3936: tāṃś ca sarvasattvān svapne carataḥ sa jānāti pratiśrutkāyāṃ pratibhāse pratibimbe marīcyāṃ māyāyāṃ gandharvanagare nirmitake carato jānāti.
S06psp_6-8u:3937: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ na bhāvato nābhāvato (PSP_6-8:167)
S06psp_6-8u:3939_0: svapnopamān pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibimbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān
S06psp_6-8u:3939_1: gandharvanagaropamān nirmitakopamān sarvadharmān jñātvā na bhāvato gṛhṇāti nābhāvato
S06psp_6-8u:3952: agrāhyāḥ sarvadharmās tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'grāhyān sarvadharmān viditvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3953_0: tathā hy agrāhyāḥ sarvadharmā avastukāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:3953_1: pratibimbopamā marīcyupamā māyopamā gandharvanagaropamā nimitakopamāḥ. na cāgrāhyāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3954: anyatra sattvā imān dharmān na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3955: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvānām arthāyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhate.
S06psp_6-8u:3956: sa ca prathamacittotpādam upādāya yad dānaṃ dadāti tat sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3962: tat sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśo na punar ātmārtham.
S06psp_6-8u:3963_0: na ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyasya kṛtaśo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhate
S06psp_6-8u:3963_1: 'nyatra sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvo na sattve sattvasaṃjñāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3978: yatra pratiṣṭhitānām ete samudācāro na pravartante,
S06psp_6-8u:3979: ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā jantusaṃjñā poṣasaṃjñā puruṣasaṃjñā pudgalasaṃjñā manujasaṃjñā mānavasaṃjñā kārakasaṃjñā vedakasaṃjñā jānakasaṃjñā paśyakasaṃjñā,
S06psp_6-8u:3980: sa sarvān imān nimiñjitasaṃmiñjitavispanditaprapañcitān vivecyānyatamānyatamena cetasā bahulam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:3981_0: anena subhūte upāyena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann ātmanā na
S06psp_6-8u:3981_1: keṣucid dharmeṣv abhiniviśate sarvasattvāṃś cānabhiniveśe pratiṣṭhāpayati lokavyavahāreṇa
S06psp_6-8u:3983: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3984: yo bhagavaṃs tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ kiṃ punaḥ sa dharmo lokavyavahāreṇābhisaṃbuddho 'rthaparamārthena?
S06psp_6-8u:3986: lokavyavahāreṇa subhūte vyavahriyate 'yaṃ tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho 'nena dharmeṇāyaṃ dharmo 'saṃbuddho 'yaṃ tathāgatena dharmo deśita iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3989: upalaṃbho hy eṣo 'nena dharmeṇāyaṃ dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3990: na ca dvayena kācit prāptir nābhisamayaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3991: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3992: yadi bhagavan na dvayenābhisamayaḥ kiṃ punar advayenābhisamayaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3995: eṣa evātrābhisamayo yatra na dvayaṃ nādvayaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3997: prapañca eṣa yo 'yam eṣām abhisamayo na ca dharmasamatāyāṃ prapañco 'sti (PSP_6-8:169)
S06psp_6-8u:4002: eṣaivātra samatā yatra na bhāvo 'bhāvo vā kīrtito,
S06psp_6-8u:4003: na ca dharmasamatā parikīrtya tena cānyo 'pi dharma upalabhyate dharmasamatāyāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:4005: agatir aviṣayo dharmasamatā yasya kasyacid bālapṛthagjanasya vāryasya vā.
S06psp_6-8u:4007: kiṃ punar bhagavan dharmasamatā tathāgatasyāpy aviṣayaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:4009_0: aviṣayaḥ subhūte sarvāryāṇāṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ vā dharmānusāriṇāṃ vāṣṭamakānāṃ vā
S06psp_6-8u:4009_1: srotaāpannānāṃ vā sakṛdāgāmināṃ vānāgāmināṃ vārhatāṃ vā śrāvakāṇāṃ vā pratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4009_2: vā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vā tathāgatasyāpy aviṣayaḥ sarvadharmasamatā.
S06psp_6-8u:4011: na punar bhagavan sarvadharmaviṣayavaśavartī tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:4014: yady anyā dharmasamatā syād anyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho,
S06psp_6-8u:4015_0: yā ca subhūte pṛthagjanānāṃ dharmasamatā yā ca śraddhānusāriṇo dharmānusāriṇo 'ṣṭamakāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4015_1: srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:4016: yā ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya samatā samataiva samatā,
S06psp_6-8u:4021_0: ayaṃ bālapṛthagjano 'yaṃ śraddhānusāry ayaṃ dharmānusāry ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotaāpanno
S06psp_6-8u:4021_1: 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_6-8u:4022: sarva ete subhūte dharmāḥ samatāyāṃ nopalabhyante,
S06psp_6-8u:4026: ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotāapanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4029: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante,
S06psp_6-8u:4032: ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4033_0: aviśeṣo vā bhagavan bhaviṣyati bālapṛthagjanānāñ ca śraddhānusāriṇāṃ ca dharmānusāriṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4033_1: cāṣṭamakānāñ ca srotaāpannānāṃ ca sakṛdāgāmināñ cānāgāmināñ cārhatāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāñ
S06psp_6-8u:4033_2: ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāñ ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ca.
S06psp_6-8u:4036_0: aviśeṣo dharmasamatāyāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānusāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4036_1: srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4038_0: yadi bhagavann aviśeṣo bālapṛthagjanānāṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānusāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4038_1: srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4039: kuta eṣāṃ bhagavaṃs trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:4043: subhūte 'nyad buddharatnam anyad dharmaratnam anyat saṃgharatnam anyā dharmāṇāṃ dharmasamatā.
S06psp_6-8u:4046: nānyad buddharatnaṃ nānyad dharmaratnaṃ nānyat saṃgharatnaṃ nānyā dharmāṇāṃ dharmasamatā,
S06psp_6-8u:4047: saced bhagavan buddharatnaṃ dharmaratnaṃ saṃgharatnaṃ yā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmasamatā,
S06psp_6-8u:4048: sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā agrāhyā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇās tat kathaṃ bhagavann eṣām alakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ phalavyavasthānaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:4049: ayaṃ bālapṛthagjano 'yaṃ śraddhānusāry ayaṃ dharmānusāry ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy (PSP_6-8:171)
S06psp_6-8u:4050: ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti?
S06psp_6-8u:4052: yadi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tadābhisaṃbudhya dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ nākariṣyad api narako vā na prajñāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:4053_0: tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā devo vā manuṣyo vā cāturmahārājikā vā devās trayastriṃśā
S06psp_6-8u:4053_1: vā yāmā vā tuṣitā vā nirmāṇaratayo vā paranirmitavaśavartino vā brahmapārṣadyo vā
S06psp_6-8u:4053_2: brahmapurohitā vā mahābrahmāṇo vā parīttābhā vā apramāṇābhā vā ābhāsvarā vā parīttaśubhā
S06psp_6-8u:4053_3: vā apramāṇaśubhā vā śubhakṛtsnā vā anabhrakā vā puṇyaprasavā vā bṛhatphalā vā asaṃjñisattvā
S06psp_6-8u:4053_4: vā aspṛhā vā atapā vā sudṛśā vā sudarśanā vā akaniṣṭhā vā devāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4054: ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattayo vā vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattayo vā ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattayo vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattayo vā,
S06psp_6-8u:4056: adhyātmaśūnyatā vā bahirdhāśūnyatā vā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:4057: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā vā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vā,
S06psp_6-8u:4058: abhijñā vā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido vāveṇikabuddhadharmā vā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni vāśītyanuvyañjanāni vā,
S06psp_6-8u:4060: dānapāramitā vā śīlapāramitā vā kṣāntipāramitā vā vīryapāramitā vā dhyānapāramitā vā prajñāpāramitā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:4061: upāyapāramitā vā praṇidhānapāramitā vā balapāramitā vā jñānapāramitā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:4065_1: 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:4069: tasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām (PSP_6-8:172)
S06psp_6-8u:4070: ayaṃ puruṣakāro yad dharmasamatāyāś ca na calanti,
S06psp_6-8u:4073: kiṃ bhagavan yathā caiva tathāgato dharmatāyāś ca na calati,
S06psp_6-8u:4074_0: tathāiva bālapṛthagjanāpi na calati śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī aṣṭamakaḥ srotaāpannaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:4074_1: sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāiva sarvadharmā na calanti.
S06psp_6-8u:4077: sarvadharmāḥ subhūte dharmatāyā na calanti na vivartante,
S06psp_6-8u:4078: yaiva subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā,
S06psp_6-8u:4079: saiva bālapṛthagjanānāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā,
S06psp_6-8u:4080_0: saiva śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānausāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām
S06psp_6-8u:4080_1: anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur
S06psp_6-8u:4081: sarva ete dharmā dharmatāṃ na vyativartante,
S06psp_6-8u:4083: tathā hy eṣaiva dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā nānyā kācid anudharmatā.
S06psp_6-8u:4085_0: yadi bhagavan yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā saiva dharmatā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ saiva śraddhānusāriṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4085_1: saiva dharmānusāriṇāṃ saivāṣṭamakānāṃ saiva srotaāpannānāṃ saiva sakṛdāgāmināṃ saivānāgāmināṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4085_2: saivārhatāṃ saiva pratyekabuddhānāṃ saiva bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saiva tathāgatānām
S06psp_6-8u:4086: ya ime bhagavan vilakṣaṇā dharmās te katham ekalakṣaṇās?
S06psp_6-8u:4087: tadyathā rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:4090: anyā vedanāyāḥ anyā saṃjñāyā anyā saṃskārāṇām anyā vijñānasya dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:4162: dharmatā, anyā yāvad daśabhūmyā bodhisattvabhūmer dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:4169: anyā dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāṃ dharmatā anyā aśītyanuvyañjanānāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:4171: anyā asaṃskṛtasya dhātor dharmatā. tat kathaṃ bhagavan naivaṃ vilakṣaṇānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatāyāṃ vyavasthānaṃ nopalabhyate?
S06psp_6-8u:4172: yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāñ ca nānātvaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:4173: na cākṛtvā dharmanānātvaṃ śakyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carituṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:4174: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ bhūmer bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmati bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:4175: yayā niyāmāvakrāntyā śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vātikramya 'bhijñāḥ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:4186: vikrīḍamāno buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayati,
S06psp_6-8u:4187: yaiḥ kuśalair mūlaiḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetrañ ca parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:4192: saiva śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānusāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:4194: ya ime bhagavan vilakṣaṇā dharmās te katham ekalakṣaṇā vilakṣaṇānāñ ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā katham ekalakṣaṇā yukteti.
S06psp_6-8u:4198: na śūnyā sā, ya vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:4224: śūnyā sā bhagavan śūnyā sā sugata.
S06psp_6-8u:4228: rūpalakṣaṇaṃ vā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:4232: laukikalokottarāṇāṃ vā dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ vā dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:4234: bālapṛthagjanānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:4235: dharmānusāriṇāṃ vā lakṣaṇam aṣṭamakānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:4236_0: srotaāpannānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ vā lakṣaṇam anāgāmināṃ vā lakṣaṇam arhatāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4236_1: vā lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4241: yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra pṛthagjanā nānyatra pṛthagjanebhyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4254: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:4255: kiṃ punar bhagavan dharmatā saṃskṛtā utāho 'saṃskṛtā?
S06psp_6-8u:4256: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:4259: na cāsaṃskṛtavyatirekeṇa saṃskṛta upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:4260: tathā hi subhūte yaś ca saṃskṛto dhātur yaś cāsaṃskṛto dhātur dvāv apy etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇau yad utālakṣaṇau,
S06psp_6-8u:4261: tat punas tathāgato lokavyavahāreṇa vyavaharati na punaḥ paramārthena,
S06psp_6-8u:4262: na ca paramārthe kaścit kāyasaṃskāre na vāksaṃskāre na manaḥsaṃskāre nānyatra kāyasaṃskārān nānyatra vāksaṃskārān nānyatra manaḥsaṃskārāt paramārtha upalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:4263: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ samatā sa paramārthas tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paramārthataś ca na calati,
S06psp_6-8u:4266: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyās tan na kasyacid dharmasya kaścid dharmaḥ kiṃcit karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:4267_0: akiṃcitkareṣv akiṃcaneṣu niṣkiṃcaneṣu cādharmeṣu kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4267_1: caran paramārthataś ca na calati sattvānāṃ ca kṛtyaṃ karoti dānena vā priyavadyatayā
S06psp_6-8u:4271: yac chūnyatā akiṃcanā niṣkiṃcanā na kasyacit kiṃcit karoti kṛtyaṃ vā akṛtyaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:4272: yadi subhūte ete sattvāḥ svayam eva śūnyatāṃ jānīyur neyaṃ tathāgatasya vṛṣabhitā bhavet,
S06psp_6-8u:4276_0: evaṃ sattvasaṃjñāyā vivecayati jīvasaṃjñāyā jantusaṃjñāyāḥ poṣasaṃjñāyāḥ puruṣasaṃjñāyāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:4276_1: pudgalasaṃjñāyā manujasaṃjñāyā mānavasaṃjñāyāḥ kārakasaṃjñāyā vedakasaṃjñāyā jānakasaṃjñāyāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:4295: śabdasaṃjñāyā gandhasaṃjñāyā rasasaṃjñāyāḥ sparśasaṃjñāyā dharmasaṃjñāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_6-8u:4309_1: vedanāsaṃjñāyās tṛṣṇāsaṃjñāyā upādānasaṃjñāyā bhavasaṃjñāyā jātisaṃjñāyā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsasaṃjñāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_6-8u:4315: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:4316: kena bhagavan na saṃskṛto dhātuḥ śūnyaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:4317: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:4319: api tu khalu subhūte yan nirmito 'nyan nirmitaṃ nirmiṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:4320: kaccit tasya tad vastv asti yan na śūnyatā?
S06psp_6-8u:4322: no bhagavan nirmitasya hi bhagavan na kaccid vastv (PSP_6-8:178)
S06psp_6-8u:4324: ya ca śūnyatā yaś ca nirmitaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4326: na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau dvāv etau śūnyatayā śūnyau,
S06psp_6-8u:4327: tat kiṃ vinigūhitam iyaṃ śūnyatāyaṃ nirmitaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:4328: tathā hi tāv ubhāv api śūnyatāyān nopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:4331: nāsti subhūte rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā yaś ca nirmito yā ca śūnyatā ubhayam etac chūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:4333: yadi bhagavann ime laukikā dharmā nirmitā api nu ime lokottarā dharmā nirmitāḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:4334: yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi,
S06psp_6-8u:4335: pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni,
S06psp_6-8u:4337_3: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahākaruṇā,
S06psp_6-8u:4338: yac ca teṣāṃ phalaṃ yena te pudgalāḥ prajñāpyante,
S06psp_6-8u:4339_0: śraddhānusārī dharmānusāry aṣṭamakaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho
S06psp_6-8u:4339_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi nu bhagavann ime dharmā nirmitāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4341: yatra punaḥ sarvadharmā nirmitās tatra kaścic chrāvakanirmitaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4345: kaścit karmanirmito 'nena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā nirmitakopamā anānākaraṇāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4347: yat punar idaṃ bhagavan prahāṇaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā nirmitā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiprahāṇam api nirmitam?
S06psp_6-8u:4349: ye kecit subhūte dharmā utpāditā vā nirodhitā vā sarva ete nirmitāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4351: katamo bhagavan dharmo yo na nirmitakaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:4353: yasya notpādo na nirodhaḥ sa dharmo na nimitaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4360: yat punar bhagavatoktaṃ śūnyatāyāś ca na calati,
S06psp_6-8u:4362: na ca kaścid dharmo yo na śūnyas tasmād bhagavan saṃmoṣadharmo nirmitako bhavet.
S06psp_6-8u:4365: sarvadharmāḥ subhūte svabhāvena śūnyās te na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā na bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ kṛtā na tathāgataiḥ kṛtā,
S06psp_6-8u:4367: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:4370: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:4371: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte pūrvaṃ bhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvo bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_6-8u:4372: nātra subhūte bhāvo nābhāvo na svabhāvo na parabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4376: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanaso maitreyapramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4377: āyuṣmāṃś ca subhūtir āyuṣmāṃś ca śāriputra āyuṣmāṃś cānandaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4378: śakraś ca devānām indraḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti.
S06psp_6-8u:4379: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāni prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ dharmakāyādhikāraḥ śikṣāparivarto nāmāṣṭamaḥ samāpta iti
S06psp_6-8u:4380: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat,
S06psp_6-8u:4381: teṣāñ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4382: oṃ gate 2 pāragate pārasaṃgate bodhi svāhā.
